text: I've been coming here for over a year now. I love the atmosphere but what shines the most is the amazing hookahs and absolutely great customer service! Everyone is on point and I've been treated like family. I definitely recommend this place to become your second home as it is now and has been mine! Thanks Luna!

This place is brand new and beautiful!  They play music videos, along with a good mix of house and hip hop.  Maysam, the manager is hot and really nice too!  Perfect spot to get out of the heat for a trendy atmosphere with affordable good food, drinks and hookah!!

As a serious Hookah lover and a local, I frequent many of the hookah lounges here in the city. I have never walked into a hookah lounge and walked back out as quickly as I did. I didn't even check in! Walking into this hidden flop around 1:00 am, the first thing I noticed was the place looked very unkept and mundane. There were a scattered few people just sitting there and staring into oblivion, no conversations, no dancing, no lively entertainment., no fun. The most OUTRAGEOUS thing I couldn't help to block out was the overly obnoxious and extremely loud music that the "DJ" was playing. In such a small place, there should never be music as loud as this was. This is not a concert venue, but a hookah lounge where there is supposed to be a relaxing mellow vibe. I couldn't even communicate with the waitress with what I wanted and she couldn't as well. My group and I started off at our table with a few waters and continuously struggled with the idea of actually staying here for a round of hookah. We were served Voss water without having the choice of tap. What if I didn't want to pay 12 dollars for a pretentious bottle of water? I didn't even want to experience the possible disappointment of a shisha sesh. The mood was so desolate and lifeless with horrible, ear-piercing "music," we had to leave, STAT! 

Hookah has caught on to be a trendy aspect in the nightlife of Las Vegas over the past decade and I get the idea of said places trying to transcend the competitive idea of what a true hookah lounge is supposed to be. I don't know about you, but this is not what a hookah lounge should consist of. Personally, these lounges should forever be evolving, innovative but still remain true to this incredible Middle Eastern tradition. Luna is lost, if not dead. They have some major improvements if they ever want to see there business evolving positively. 

I've been past Luna many a time because of my insatiable hunger for the incredible tacos at Tacos El'gordo and I've always wondered what that eerie structure in the back was with an empty parking lot??   

Oh.....a place I will never go back to again.

Clean, great set up and the hookahs are AMAZING :) Jackie was our server and was very friendly as was all of the staff. Great atmosphere if you are looking to just relax and hang out and also if you do want that club feel to let loose and have fun! Good music, good crowd. Will definitely be back here every time I visit!!!

This place is amazing if your looking for a chill place to come smoke hookah, eat or drink with friends  come to this place it is a very friendly  service... Especially by Kenny Mundo who handles your hookahs for your stay
Amazing chill out spot with friends.. Great music and entertainment, hookah's are so fresh and tasty. Recommend pure mint!
Jaque and the luna staff was great. we been looking for a hookah place and very glad we went to this one. i highly recommend this place and cant wait to come back...

Just cam here three days in a row ! And I have to say thank you to the friendly staff ! 
They answered all my questions and concerns everyday had a different theme and event so it was never a dull moment here 
Food great 
Drinks amazing 
Hookahs flavorful and long lasting !
First time in Vegas and wanted to try a hookah lounge.   Megan was great,  helped us pick flavors and made sure our drinks were full.  Will definitely come back next time!

Customer service was aweful. When we walked in one if the employees had to call him out to tell him he had customers. When we decided we wanted food He was so busy chatting with a friend who walked in for 20 minutes. The food took forever to come out. And again this other employee who so happened to walk into the kitchen told the Guy our food was done. (Still sitting and chatting with a friend) then he disappeared after we were done. The Guy that was cleaning everything had to find him for our bill.  Seriously if we were shitty people we could of walked out of there with 45 still in our pockets. Hats off to the chef, the Guy who helped us out and the women who was there a couple days before hand. They did a good job. But your fellow employee or owner made me rate a 2.

Incredible drinks. Sexy staff. Amazing food. Great prices - what more could you ask for? Music? They have that covered, too! They play all sorts of hits from the 90's to modern hits to music from around the world. It's never boring.

I recommend Subzero with Kiwi for the hookah flavor. You must try the Strawberry Luna Martini...but ask for it over ice and a lime wedge, it makes it even better. The white pizza is killer, too. 

I'm a frequent visitor, so take my word for it, you'll love it here. Especially Monday's - it's half off everything for locals!

Ive been to many hookah bars and Luna is by far the best in Vgas they use Haze tobacco which is the best to smoke. Kenny and Albert are very helpful and courteous if you are looking for a great spot to just relax and actually enjoy your smoking experience check out Luna Lounge you won't regret it!
Nice decor, workers were very informative on their wide selection of products. I had a great time. :)

Was looking for a chill hooka spot to have some drinks and conversation with friends. Decor is cool and music selection is pretty good, mostly hip hop. Way too loud though. Had to yell to hear what people were saying and and beer was $8. Other than that it was alright

It was my first time in Vegas and I was very unsure about where to go to eat and relax, and then I found this place on Google. The lounge itself is very relaxing, with nice but not too loud music, and the food is AMAZING. I definitely recommend the white pizza or stuffed mushrooms. the hookah is smooth and easy to use, and waiters are continually checking on the coals for you. I ordered the pineapple bowl with seduction flavored shisha and it was absolutely delicious. it is a MUST GO!!!!!
Good hookah! Long lasting hookah for your money. Come buy and enjoy I did and no I don't work for them lol.
I really love this lounge they treat u like so good u enjoy your time here I going to come back tomorrow it nice I really recommend this place

This place is okay. It's beautiful inside and our server was great! If you like hiphop and top hits type of music the Do not go on Saturday nights the music is horrible and was so bad that we didn't finish our hookah because the music started to sound like noise and just was not fun or entertaining also the DJ was some old guy that looked to be in his early 60's which was kinda whack. And apparently there is some sort of dress code. Me & my party was about 9 people and apparently only 2 of us were in dress code.  They had on a shirt and pants. They rest of us had shorts on and shirts and maxi dresses.... so I didn't really get that, but they let us in anyway and when we got in it was dead not too many people inside, my guess would be because of the horrible music. the place was kinda a joke.
Good atmosphere, nice hosts... Jackie is real cool! Definitely letting all all my peeps know to hit this spot when they come to Vegas!
Marian was great it was our first time at a hookah lounge and she mad it fabulous!!!! she's a rockstar!!! #TeamMarian

no stars! called earlier and spoke with  "some person" UNFORTUNATELY we didn't get a name... But  they informed us no reservation was needed!  after spending  cab fare from the strip, party of 10, lots of $$$$, we got here and the (mangaer) told us we needed a reservation!!! what!!! noooo... he didnt accommodate us! (even a little) instead... rude & horrible! plzzzzzzz dont go here! save your $$$$

Went to kill time while our friends check into the hotel. Clean place, and pretty large compared to the places back home. I am a bit of a hookah snob and was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the hookahs. The only downside was that they used quick lites and it was a little pricey, but was expected. Martha took good care of us and the drinks were very tasty! I could easily see myself becoming a regular if I didn't live so far away.
Nice place. Liked the ambience. Was on a corporate party do don't know how pricey it is.

Luna lounge is a great place to chill and relax to great flavored hookahs. I am totally diggin the music and our sever, Jacqui, was very friendly and accomodating. We will come back to this place during the daytime for another great time.
Chill place, very awesome interior design. Mandy is great and very nice! Great place for hanging out with friends.

Dude I love this place! I found this place through Groupon in October and took my boyfriend in so the could relax from the hustle and bustle of our trip. The staff is hella friendly ! We received hookah, hummus, pita, AND tea. We enjoyed our first visit so much that we came here again in February. Enjoyable atmosphere, awesome staff and great hookah :)

Came on a Wednesday night. Everybody was having a great time. All the staff was super attentive and enjoyed their jobs. Atmosphere was amazing. Highly recommend. No other words to explain.  You will enjoy your time here. Thumbs up!!!

My girls and I went to Luna on Thursday for Ladies Night Out and was quite disappointed due to the advertisement.  Lunalasvegas.com, which is their website, has a flyer that says 6+ ladies get free bottle and hookah.  So when I ask about the bottle and mixers, I asked about the hookah and they told me no hookah.  I explained to the waitress that on the website it says free hookah.. she goes and get the owner, and at this time I have the flyer up on my phone.  I show the owner the flyer, he walks away and then comes back with his phone showing me a Facebook page with a "new" flyer (which when you go on the Facebook page and scroll alllllll the way to August it doesn't have the "hookah" listed BUT when they captioned, it says COMP HOOKAH" that only says free bottle. I tells him that I didn't reference to Facebook, I went to their actual site where the flyer was (events).  He goes on to basically tell me that he wasn't honoring the hookah even though it was on the site... We ended having to pay for it, which wasn't a problem, it was just the principle of the fact when you advertise something, that's usually what's expected. The venue itself was nice layout, the hookah was good, just disappointed on how business was conducted.  He could of honored it or even gave a discount, but to tell us straight out NO was rude and unprofessional. And FYI, the flyer is STILL there and I advised him to update asap because he doesn't want to have this encounter again.. it may have been minor but someone will make a major deal out of it
I come to luna hookah lounge to a lot a bunch if great people working there. Fell in love with this place! Come by and see me!

The hookah was great. That was the only good thing about my visit. Their hours state they open at 2pm during the week. My party and 2 other separate parties showed up exactly at 2pm and they told us they weren't open. When we all said that the website lists an opening time of 2pm, they then said that they were open but weren't ready for customers because they'd just gotten new tables that needed to be moved. (Sidebar: I noted the dirty tables and it was clear to me that they weren't new. And the fact that I see older reviews with pictures of those same "new" tables...lets me further know that I was correct in my original assessment. So I call b.s. on that excuse.) Well that is not my issue. I'm sure they weren't ready because they aren't accustomed to having customers in the afternoon on a weekday. But I work in the industry and know it well. You can never gauge what your customers will do so you have to be prepared for all possible scenarios. That means they should have had the restaurant ready for service 15 minutes before opening time, not still trying to set up at the time that you open. Failure to plan on your part does not constitute an emergency on mine. But I digress. So after 15-20 minutes, they finally let us sit down. Then we wait. We had to wait for water. We had to wait for someone to take the order which was just the hummus trio, teapot, and hookah. We had to wait for the trio which was just a duo of regular hummus and garlic hummus. (Sidebar: I'm a chef. I worked in a Mediterranean restaurant for some time. I know for a fact that a proper hummus cannot be made without garlic. So they gave me garlic hummus and garlic-garlic hummus. That's like giving me a regular coffee and a coffee with caffeine. I would have respected them more if they'd said we only have regular hummus right now. Don't try to pull an okie doke by making up a menu item since you think I won't know any better.) We waited forever for the hookah...about 45 minutes total. We kept asking for the manager to come out and he never would. After the 4th time he finally came and that was when we discovered that our apathetic, nonchalant. unapologetic waiter was actually the manager meaning that nothing was going to be resolved. If the waiter who doubles as a manager doesn't care about the customer then the other employees certainly won't...ergo why they didn't care about rushing to let us sit down at 2pm when they restaurant opened. The hookah was quality but it's not enough to warrant me going back and dealing with slow service and indifference to the customer's satisfaction.
I came from San Diego to vegas and decided to check out Luna Lounge. Hookah is good and the service is great. Good vibes all around with mixtures of locals and tourist

The hookah was really bad, had to change it twice and was still awful. 
If your a serious hookah user this is not for you!
Might be a an okay place to hang but not for smoking hookah.
Super great service! Cool atmosphere and best hands down best hookah bar in Vegas! The people in here are very friendly and the music is great. My waitress Jacque was amazing
First time here, super sexy atmosphere! Heard about it from some friends and decided to check it while I was in town, service was great and Marian took real good care of us.. Can't wait to come back
Jaque is really nice & explained the specials thoroughly! My wife & I enjoyed it. Really good hookah flavors. I will go back for sure

Went here for a pre game hookah session before we hit the strip. My experience was great! The servers were very nice and the hookah and drinks were strong as well. We went on a Monday so the mood was mellow and the lights were dim. Very nice atmosphere. The prices weren't too bad either. Definitely coming back on my next trip!

Not a good time at the Luna got two bowls and mind you I like to smoke hookah.. both bowls were burnt and the guy that set the hookah up the second time told us " I hope you like the bowl if not I am going to have to charge you" well the second bowl sucked more than the first one.... bad time at the Luna they need to step there game up. Or have better customer service...

Best place to be 
Opens early then any place 
Clean n out
Great staff                         
5* aren't enough for this place 
Highly recommend 
They have good food 
Dance floor
Dj 
Big ass bar
I never write reviews,  but im here right now and hands down the best hookah loungee ever. The end.

I'm visiting Vegas this weekend to celebrate my 10yrs Anniversary. Needed a chill hangout spot to relax my feet from walking the strip. Nice little spot hidden in the small shop near all you can eat Korean BBQ. Walked in, felt like a dance club lol without the hooker shoes and skanky dress. Super chill environment that offer hookah, drinks, food and dancing room.  Pretty nice.
Love them! Such a fun place to just chill and have a low key time they have all the jams!!
Very relaxing place. Servers are very nice and helpful. Awesome place for a group gathering. My first hooka experience

Hookah is great here. It's super strong and we'll mixed. They put the coals in these cages which prevents you from moving the coals but they are quick to blow out the bowls and refill charcoal. The food is awesome which is a lot to say for a hookah lounge. The Kind of people that come here are pretty diverse from the ghetto type to business men. Overall it was a good experience.

I'm a local girl serious about my hookah. Me and boyfriend decided to try a new place so we consulted Yelp (of course). Luna lounge was terrible. The staff was inattentive and unhelpful. Our beers were empty for a good 20 minutes before I went to the bar to get the check (no refill needed at that point). The hookah was a tad harsh. We asked for an ice tip and instead they put ice cubes in the tray. When getting our smoke on me and my man like to snuggle close...who doesn't? Impossible at Luna Lounge. Instead of the comfy couches usually seen in these types of establishments, they had uncomfortable individual chairs. My man is only 6' tall but his legs were cramping up. The environment certainly doesn't encourage staying awhile and trying multiple hookah flavors. The DJ played some sort of international music, maybe a draw for some, but certainly not what you want to hear when vibing out is the goal. I will not be back and do not recommend this place for anyone other than tourists staying in the area.

Small location but nice lounge. Got there on a Monday around 4:30pm so there wasn't many people or staff but the guy there was nice and made us a Pineapple Krush hookah and 2 good drinks. I got the mango mojito which was ok and my wife got the caramel Cosmo or something like that and she loved it. It's a relax and chill environment and it was easy to redeem my Groupon.

I was in Vegas for my friends Bachelorette party. we had a big group. Luna did an excellent job taking care of us.

The service: EXCELLENT! the manager was amazing and the waitress was sweet, fast, and very attentive.
The Atmosphere: Live DJ, dance floor, dim lights, comfortable chairs and couches, classy and trendy décor. you can tell every detail was thought through... extremely professional and clean!
Food/Drinks: They had a full bar! uncommon at hookah lounges and much appreciated! the food was delicious and it was like 2 am and they were still serving their whole menu. the prices were very reasonable!
Hookah: this place and the manager take great pride in serving the perfect hookah. im very picky about my hookah and I smoke everyday (not to mention I am middle eastern!) and really the hookah here was delicious. coal was always fresh. there was no smoking down time at all!

we will never go anywhere else for hookah while we are in vegas!!!

Thank you Mike and the Staff at Luna!

It's a little hard to find but it's behind the block of shops. Chilled out atmosphere on a Monday night which is nice. Interior is quite stylish for a hookah lounge, more like a nightclub design which tends to be the least focused (interior design) in places of this sort. Little details like lighting, TV screens, projector makes all the difference. They have a wide variety of hookah flavours and other types of hookah base like glass hookah on request for extra $. I can imagine on busy evenings like Friday and Saturday nights it would be busier with louder music and more nightclub feeling as there's a DJ booth in the corner and there's room to show off your moves. They serve cocktails too. Bathrooms are clean, spacious and bright which is a bonus. The waitress is attentive and friendly and tries to accommodate your needs. They have free wifi which comes in handy when you want to book your next show in Vegas! ;)
Just garbage. Not worth it. They don't serve you. Sat for 30 minute and didn't get served. Asked 3 times to get served. DO NOT GO.

Great hookah place on the strip. We ordered two hookahs for the group and although the first one wasnt fixed up well the peeps replaced the stuff without a problem. Generally friendly people at this joint with good ambience and music. Double Thumbs up to this place.

Rating - 4 Stars

Great place to just chill and relax. Lots of standard flavors and special flavors to choose from. Very friendly and attentive staff too!

Word of advice: don't sit in a corner cause the draft will mess your tricks up.

I am a hookah smoker and this is my second time here. This is the only Hookah lounge I will come to in Las Vegas. I also was referred here from my local hookah lounge in San Diego and I too recommend it to any hookah lovers. The service is great, Mandy is great and kind. The atmosphere is nice and they have belly dancing as well. Food is good in case you are craving a bite to eat.

Service was beyond horrible. We asked 3 different people to change our coals and nothing. The waitress only checked on us once but when it came to the check she was on top of that. Dont plan on coming back here.
Very good ambience and hookah. Mandi was a great waitress, served quality drinks quick
This place is outstanding.  Very well worth the price. I tried the fruit bowl and it was great. Last long and its a great experince to try something new. Definantly beats cloud 9 :).
I wouldn't go back if I was in town. They told me I had to spend 200 bucks to sit inside. The hookah wasn't all that great. Music was okay.

A great hookah spot. Very clean and the tapas are excellent.   Definitely a solid place to get some food, drinks, and hookah!  I had the summer melon for my hookah.  Definitely will return for other flavors.
Cool lounge cool music.. very friendly and helpful on hookah and flavors thanks Jackie for the experience!

This was a first trying hookah pipes for myself and my wife. We found this place through groupon and ordered the mango hookah and the mango martinis. Both were smooth and delicious. The servers were super nice and the atmosphere is hip and cool will return soon
Great hookah! Service was horrible though. Food wasn't that great either. Won't be back.

I was there Saturday night and it was horrible! We had bad service and were placed outside. This was strange since there was a lot of seating still available inside. We were told we could NOT sit inside unless we paid for bottle service. What was worse was that it was my birthday and that did not matter to them. They placed us outside in the cold and were annoyed if we ever asked for something. Also, my friend went inside with his hat on and was told to remove his hat (his hat which he wore since it was 40 something degrees outside). MEANWHILE, there were over 5 other guys INSIDE the lounge that ALL had hats. So why single my one friend that had a good reason for wearing the hat, when multiple other guys wore the hat inside. I had bought a groupon to go to this hookah lounge again, since we had fun in the best. You best believe I have returned that groupon. 

I went here for my bachelorette party in April, and it was great. The drinks were good and the service was great. The DJ even asked what song I would like to play to celebrate the day. This is why I am giving 2 stars and not 1.

Been here quite a few times now, it's our second favorite hookah bar in Vegas. The BF knows his hookah and he really likes this place. The atmosphere is fun; dark and trendy, but can get loud at times depending on what's going on. The seating is comfortable, especially when you can snag a couch. We've always had good service here.
Over priced small areas stuck up staff drinks taste like Capri Suns music was janky just never go don't waste money or time

Amazing hookah lounge. The hookah chef Mustafa made my mix on point. I came from town, and I can't describe to you how glad I am to be here and have my mix done right. Definitely one of the best hookah lounges I've been to.

I first heard about this place from a couple of friends. It was past midnight on a Sunday and we felt like dancing and drove to Luna. The music was late 80's and 90's hip hop and some alternative. I was pleased to hear and do something different, have some watermelon, raspberry, mint hookah. The waitress was fun and friendly. I would return when I'm craving hookah and cool ambiance.

This hookah lounge is one of the best that we've visited - visited many lounges in the Los Angeles & Atlanta areas - good energy, good pricing, good music - excellent Super Bowl host ...highly recommend
This place is soooo awesome. Nice place to hang out! Love the vibe. Las Vegas hot spot!!!!!

I'll be straight out and honest, this place isn't good. First, the service is terrible, it's empty but they never come to change coals and took forever to bring the check. The hookah was bad too the flavor was burnt. I don't think I'll ever return here.

The worst place if u want get board go there. Thursday and Saturday night I went their food is horrible, both nights DJ didn't start at times the waiter told me. on Saturday I had American guests so they asked for Persian DJ I made mistake I took them there thought maybe it was during week day ,after bad appetizer they didn't like order food I invited them to my home and ordered pizza. Shame on the owner. They don't know how manage their business, at 11am I called to talk with owner employee told they will come at 11 pm. So funny owners come at the end of night. Plz don't try them u waste ur time. Oh I forgot to tell at Thursday i ordered chicken tandoori I couldn't eat more than 1 piece bc it has too much oil and got food poisoning on Friday.
Jackie gave us great service! Very polite and attended to us. Always made sure we were ok and comfortable. Thanks again! Had a great time.
It took longer than expected to get service. The prices are good and the atmosphere is cool. I was about to leave bc of how long we had to waited though.

Best hookah spot in Vegas. Whether you go during the evenings or after a night out, it's always poppin'. The hookah is good, vibe is awesome and drinks aren't Vegas-pricy at all! Everything is very reasonably priced. The music and DJ's they have are literally the best part... They never disappoint! I make it a point to go there every trip, multiple nights in a row. I love that the crowd is mainly locals as well as out of towners. Overall, great spot, definitely visit it when you get a chance. It's walking distance from the Encore, right across the street in a low key plaza. Thanks Luna, see you soon! I always have the best memories from there :)

Honestly an awesome spot to come relax. I got lemon mint and it was amazing. Very comfortable seating area and not overly loud music for a Sunday afternoon. The hookahs are clean too unlike other lounges

Service was the worst, If you are Going to this place for a Hookah, Don't !!!!
we did not enjoy the Hookah (we ordered 2), they told us they do not have the 2 apples flavor, so we went to a tobacco place 2 miles away just to get 2 apples tobacco, after we bought the tobacco and came back they told us that they have 2 apples but it was hidden somewhere !!! 
they did not check or replace the charcoal for the hookah only once.
i will never come back to this place EVER !!

Never the type to write these types of reviews, but believe me when I say DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY COMING TO THIS RIDICULOUS PLACE. 

Allow myself to explain my reasoning behind why I would never ever go back to this poorly ran establishment. I have been here twice now and I can confidently say never again.

ENCOUNTER ONE: First of all, looking for a place to smoke hookah and get drinks with friends -- this was a location that came up that provided both. I was even more excited that when I googled it, a GroupOn came up. As a precaution, I called Luna prior to purchasing it and they said they were accepting the GroupOns and were open until 3-4 in the morning. With that said, I purchased the GroupOn, which stated one hookah, one hummus trio plate, and one pot of Teavanna tea. My friends and I arrived around 11:30pm. Once seated, I presented the GroupOn to our server and she actually physically took my phone (without asking) to a room behind the bar. When she returned, she said, "We do not honor GroupOns after 10:00pm." I, very nicely, told her we had called ahead of time and no time limit was mentioned -- nor was any time indicated in the fine print of the GroupOn itself. Very unapologetic, she said there was nothing she could do. I then asked if I could speak to the owner, who, I would like to add, was probably one of the most emotionless and careless people I had ever met. After talking in circles for about 10 minutes, he agreed to provide us with free hookah and a plate of fries on the house... and that he would not use our GroupOn, that we could use it next time we come in. I noticed he had pushed the redeem button on the GroupOn app and when I told him this, he just said not to worry about it... to just remind him next time we come in and he would take care of us. How nice of him, right? So, the night went on, the atmosphere was okay. The music was decent at times, at others it was not good at all. We ended up spending about 250$ on drinks and shots, but the service was terrible. We would have to flag someone down any time we needed something and half the time, I had to ask twice to get something. This is definitely not a place that knows how to work their tips... These girls did not care about providing good customer service one bit. The night ended, and while I wouldn't say it was a memorable night, it wasn't a total fail either -- so I told myself I would give it another try next time. I did have a GroupOn I still was able to use for my next visit afterall.

ENCOUNTER TWO: Fast forward two weeks later. I had a friend who was in town visiting, looking for something chill but fun to do. Arriving at 8:30pm, clearly before the supposed undisclosed 10:00pm time frame, I presented the GroupOn to our server. I explained the situation about the last time and how the owner said he would let us use this at another time. She requested to take my phone to show the owner and spoke with him briefly across the room, where he was sitting in a corner smoking hookah with two other people. She came back to say that it was the other owner who said that, and they had called him numerous times without any ability to contact him for verification. She apologized and said there was nothing she could do. Despite the situation, no customer service was given. We decided to stay since we were already there. I was already annoyed... but 30 minutes later, I see the same owner, THE SAME OWNER WHO TOLD ME TO MY FACE HE WOULD HONOR IT TWO WEEKS AGO, who was who she spoke with, who promised the use of the Groupon. We made eye contact for more than a second, to where I knew he knew who I was... and all he could do was awkwardly look away and keep walking. All I could do was laugh! It is obvious business for them isn't going well, based of how the place was not busy at all... but you turning customers away is not going to help your business either. The fact this place lacks serious customer service and has owners who know nothing about customer service themselves vouches for why it is that way. 

Bottom line, I gave this place a chance... TWICE. The servers are terrible, the drinks are overpriced, the venue is small, and above all, the owner himself is a lying piece of scum. Living in Las Vegas for the last 10 years, I've never been to such a poorly managed establishment. Never again, Luna. My last words: FUCK THAT PLACE.

Arrived at 8:04 so we couldn't use our Groupon deal because acceptance ended at 8pm. 

I gave two stars because the hookah was well priced as well as the drinks, however, the service was terrible. We ordered waters and an alcoholic beverage, the cocktail came but I had to ask multiple times for the water. I saw they were placed on the bar so I walked up and collected them myself. Also had to ask multiple times for the bill. I saw the bartender answer the phone multiple times but I never got an answer when I called. 

It's an ok environment but I wouldn't go back.

If I could give it zero stars I would!! This place is a joke. 
Last night me and some friends came to hang and listen to music .. we walked in got sat and began our night.. we ordered the ice hookah with the server who came back 5 minutes later saying they don't have the ice so she suggested the fruit bowl which would be an addition $10 charge to the hookah.. we said ok fine we'll try it.. she said they hookah would be $35.. no problem. We ordered at 11pm ... 1145 still no hookah so we flag down the server and asked what was going on and she couldn't give a direct answer so we got the attention of the host who told us the server is new and she'll check on the hookah for us. She apologizes and says she talked to the owners and they will take 10 percent off the hookah.. ok cool. I ordered and drink for $7 and water for $5 .. end of the night the check comes and this is where ish gets bad! The bill says the hookah is $40.05, the ice is $5, water is $5 and the cocktail is $7 so after taxes it was $63 and change.. WRONG. Martha was Amazing! We love the music from CH Jerry Nash also.. Thank you so much for the hospitality and great bottle service deals. Definitely coming back tomorrow

Never have I experienced staff so rude. I'm here giving you my business, so I expect some friendliness. They rush you with the checks in order to refuse helping you. When I asked the waitress for a drink, she looked right at me and nodded me off as if she didn't see me! After that I refuse to give them any of my service as I'm treated like I'm non existent.

We came in here with friends and had two other friends that where coming to meet us. We got seated by a very nice girl and she provided excellent customer service. There was a security who WAS very rude and did not let our friends come in with us and was attempting to charge a $200 deposit to get in. I understand the policy but they where not attempting to get a table they where simply meeting up with us. Will not be back here again it was such a hassle!

So, this place plays awesome music on Saturday nights. Our night here started alright they didn't have tables available so they had us sit outside but the waitress came out three times before she asked us if we've been helped. We ordered one hookah which was pretty pricey at $22. The cocktails start at $9.00. However, one of the guys that handle the hookahs gave us a free new flavor, watermelon mint which was pretty good. The guys are much more helpful than the actual waitresses. $166 for bottle service but it includes hookah, fries, and juice for any number of people.

The place was nice but the only one thing they are known for, (Hookah)! Was awkward, they need to work on getting some nice mixes.

Anyways the place was awesome and the costumer service was top notch, recommend for all hookah smokers.

I was really excited to see that not only do they carry Haze Tobacco but that Luna also offers fruit bowls. The hookah was horribly pack, the service was beyond slow and they're drinks tasteless. 

The music was great!

So Yelp deleted my previous review due to an autocorrect error... so I'm re-reviewing. 

I've been to Luna quite a few times... to be honest, partially because I was unaware of other hookah establishments. 

Luna is a nice hookah lounge tucked away in a plaza located in the north strip area. The first time we went, we didn't find it initially because it's more so in the back from the directions that GPS gave. If you're in the plaza near Encore, you're in the right place! 

The atmosphere is kind of noisey, definitely dark and trendy. On average, we experience average service. Our initial visit was great but it seems that every time we've returned... the attentiveness has dropped a smidge each time. You've gotta really keep an eye out if you notice your coals not hitting as great. They use coconut coals (it appears) which is nice. The hookahs that I've had hit alright... a little light, but it works. 

I wish during the day that they'd let a little light in...but it's on the strip and I don't think hookahing casually has picked up around here. I do enjoy the music video-dj thing they've got going on. Pretty much every song that plays is accompanied by a video. We've also visited right before a comedy night... which I kind of want to return and check out. 

The price of the hookah isn't so bad given Luna's location... if you find yourself staying on the strip and wanting to hookah...check this place out! :)
Visited on a Saturday night for a friends birthday and the staff was very rude. When we asked to speak with a manager was told there was no manager available. Horrible service will not be back!

Great service, great hookah, awesome waitresses

Would recommended to anyone looking for a place to relax.

We were initially impressed, the appearance was very nice... but the staff lacked energy and there was no music. We were bored. The hookah hoses were small and thin. Maybe we do hookah so much that my expectations just weren't meant. On top of the lack luster experience it was quite expensive compared to other hookah lounges.

This is the worst place ever !!! I came with a few friends to smoke hookah and the security guard was trying to charge my other friends 200$ and it was basically discriminating based on the way they dressed and they were gonna drink there and not smoke! I just didn't appreciate his nasty attitude and him rolling his eyes and treating my friends like crap. He's African American and we were being so nice and friendly with him and he came at us rude and disrespectful!

Please teach your staff to be more welcoming then poor service:)
Very disappointed with there service and hookah. This place is overrated and a waste of time and money.

It was cool. We went on a Friday Night about 1130/midnight. It really wasn't that busy, but the DJ was bumpin all the latest Hip Hop.  The Hookah was Good.  Nice Atmosphere.  Waitress was on point and the Drinks were Strong!
They have the best Hookah ever!! Like ever!!! Nice customer service is added too, my husband Kamyar took me here and is literally the best spot in Vegas

Amazingg!! Loved this place my husband and I went on a Saturday at 10pm when the live DJ comes & we had a blast ended up skipping the club & stayed till 3am ... Everytime were in town we must come here!

Bring ear plugs if you come in on a Sunday night.  We came here just to have a chill night after being at the pool all day on our trip to Vegas, and I felt like I was at a taping of American Idol rejects. They had "performers" on the stage promoting their music, and it was so awful.  I'm not one to squash dreams, and this isn't a review on the singers, but if your venue is super small, why do you have the sound system blasting while these people are trying to hit Alicia Keys voice notes? I even saw a girl sitting on the couch over plugging her ears, I thought it was hilarious.  The hookah had juice coming up the hose, nasty, and let's not forget to mention they took 40 minutes to serve.  Even the MC (who was so annoying) asked everyone to be patient and it's worth it. Ya, ok.

I wanted to update my review and give this place 4 stars solemnly due to the fact that Maya was our server last night and she was absolutely amazing! She was so friendly from the moment we sat down. Her smile was beautiful and so welcoming! She came over immediately after we sat down to take our order, she checked on us every 15 minutes to see if we needed anything further, she delivered our drinks within 5 minutes of ordering, and she was engaging. I will def be requesting her the next time we stop in!

Nice decor and staff was helpful and friendly! We're newbies and have our own hookah and the hookah building professional even showed us how he makes the best hookah bowl. Will be back next time we're in town!

I've went to Luna on 3 different occasions. Each time that I've went the service was terrible. You will literally have to wait 10-15 minutes for your waitress and that's NOT on a busy night. Great hookah but TERRIBLE service.

5 star service! David is great and Judy is awesome. Thanks for making my fiance's Bday celebration special. Prices are BOMB, food is BOMB, Hookah is BOMB. No Surprise charges at the end either. 4 Stars vs 5, because I feel like they could have had a better playlist. I look forward to booking tables again and again! :) Xo
Out from LA visiting and decided to come try the hookah. Service and hookah were great. People were great
Awesome place for some relaxing on the strip.  Great prices, too!  Enjoyed several visits on my week in Vegas.

Great place! Love the atmosphere. Sooo many hookah flavors to try so you can't go wrong! I tried the "Guest What?" Flavor and it was great! Both Jay and Victor were awesome! Next time I come back to Vegas I will be heading over to Luna Lounge!

Another super chill spot in Vegas. The spot is ducked off in a strip mall type touristy part of town. The interior is really sleek and posh. Leather seating and glass tables with a overall dark theme. You might think that you were in a night club.

I ordered some of there food as well and I wasnt a fan to much but not so much that I would go back or that I didnt enjoy myself. We really enjoyed ourselves. We checked in on Yelp and got i think 20 % off a hookah. 

So win win situation for us.
Great hookah lounge on the strip. .. great music!  This is the spot people! Great prices on hookah and chill ambiance. .. check in and get 15% off hookah..  Open till 2am.. check it out!
Having a great time with my cousin and girlfriend, hands down the best hookah lounge in Las Vegas! Upscale hookah , food and drinks!

The location waa perfect, I am celebrating my birthday and enjoyed my time. Kenny was on top of service and Jackie was a sweetheart. The OMG hookah was good and the wings were yummy. I would definitely come back when I come back to Vegas.

Came to this place because friends wanted to chill. Good vibes except you can't bring your vape products in here.

Overall service was good and the music is loud and bumpin. Lighting is dimmed and furniture and seating is comfortable and up to date. Coming back again to get some hookah! Vernie is a good hostess very friendly.
I dont smoke but my friends did. Great place but the service was excellent and very friendly. On the hooka my friends really liked it and said its cool clean smooth

This place was poppin OFF for a Monday night!! So much fun! By 11 pm, it was packed and there was a dj and everything. I've never seen a hookah lounge get so lit...on a Monday...amazing. 

Their coffee is bomb. Really strong and delicious. Their food is okay and presented like it's gourmet, but it's pretty average. We ordered jalapeno poppers, crispy shrimp, and hummus. Everything felt like it had been frozen and popped in the microwave before plating. Typical hookah lounge cuisine so nothing shocking here. Don't come here to eat if you have high food standards. There is a taco place around the corner with a line across the block and it looks to be worth the wait. 

The hookah is really good! The service is great, especially considering how crowded it was this evening. I would come back here for the hookah and crowd for sure. It's definitely worthwhile!

Loveeeeee this place the service the hooka, food, drinks!!!! Of course my waitress Jackie is amazing on top on everything making sure drinks were full and if hooka was good. I'm literally here at least once a week!!!! You will not regret coming here.

Luna Lounge is a really nice way to end a busy day. It's a chilled out location with courteous and efficient staff. I didn't order any food but all the dishes I saw around me looked very tempting. 

In terms of sheesha, there was a great variety of flavors, and the staff are willing to recommend something should you so desire (and they'll get it right, too!). 

Best of all, one of the days I was there, they had a DJ who kept the music at a level where you could still hold a conversation. All in all, a really positive experience.

Although the location is not easy nor fancy, the inside is very nice and cool. Do not get disincurage by the location. 
They have a great collection of cooktelas and hookahs. I got a recommendation for the Don Frizzell hookah, which is mix of fruits. The highlight of the place is thier Ice hoes, its transformed the flavor to another level. I will never have my hookah without the ice hoes.

Thanks to Luna Lounge there was some reliable hookah experience on the strip. It's behind Encore so basically right where the strip ends - seems spike a shady area but actually it's not bad at all! Staff was good overall... ordered the chicken kebabs- food is average but morrocan tea is good.

While visiting Vegas I decided to try out this place and was blown away. The vibe was real laid back, the hookah and tea were great, the food was delicious, and the DJ was on point. Everyone I interacted with was friendly and I will definitely be coming back here whenever I am in Vegas.

Awesome! Went with my love and we had a blast. Great food and reasonable hookah prices. Plenty of favors. The ambiance is beautiful and intimate. A nice change of pace place in Vegas to relax and do something different. Really nice staff, clean, and classy. Will be back when I come back to Vegas.
The best Hookah Lounge for drinks and a live DJ.  Had my signature martini and he had a Long Island.  Try the Candy Cane Mint hookah.  Be sure to check this place out, even if you're not into Hookah.

Nice entertainment, 1st time seeing a belly dancer. Staff was friendly and the place accommodated us even though we didn't  have a reservation on a busy night.. Would definitely return if Im ever in Vegas.

Total waste of time and money. We paid $17 for a cab ride from Bellagio to this ghetto-looking strip mall at 10:30 p.m. on Thursday night. The place looked nice enough but was really slow with only about 10 customers. My friend and I placed our order for a hookah and two drinks and informed the waitress that we had a Groupon. She told us that the Groupon is only good from 11 a.m. to 7 p.m. I don't remember that being in the fine print, but I guess it was. She checked with her manager, but they wouldn't budge. Rather than throw good money after bad, we chose to leave. A decent manager would've offered to honor our Groupon or at least give us a discount.
The hookah quality has dropped a bit I would say, but the friendliness of the staff does make it up. Food quality is decent.

This place is awesome! Hooka is delicious! Def try the mango, and the drinks are decent. Definitely do it. Good atmosphere. Amazing music. Don't judge a book by it's cover. Great service, Crystal is awesome, be sure to sit in her section! I'm coming back every time I visit Vegas!

Pretty cool spot on the boulevard if you want to hear some good house music, puff on some Haze hookah tobacco and have a few drinks. I went for an industry event and everything was great, except for the bartenders. The doormen, management, and hookah runners were all very professional, but I found the women behind the bar snooty, but typical to Vegas. We aren't all tourists.

Hey my name is Martin  I went here with my brothers 
We order 2 Hookah and we wait like 30mint and in the end they said they don't have a Hookah available like it's really bad service and bad Hookah lounge ever in Las Vegas ever.
Chill vibes, great dance vibes, a relaxed all around place. The coal turners are a little slow later in the night and the ladies bathroom needs a little bit of work too

This hookah lounge was horrible besides the waitress being really nice ...it was my first time there and the front security was really rude ..once we got our hookah it got really harsh within a few min ..if you're trying to smoke hookah and have a great time I recommend to go somewhere else but here !

Recently we have been in Vegas and decided to go and get some hookah. Luna hookah is amazing place. I liked hookah a lot but especially I loved their earl grey tea it was amazing. Very kind stuff. Recommend everyone to go.

AMAZING is an understatement.  Im from La. Traveled the globe.  Been to some great lounges.  This one has it all.  Distinct-fully flavor filled food, clean & everlasting hookah, along with awesome entertainment and staff.

First off, we got the Groupon for a hookah up to four people. So since there was 5 of us, we bought 2. They wouldn't let us sit together at first. AND we called to make sure there wasn't a minimum amount of drinks we had to purchase. They said there isn't a minimum BUT you have to get here before 8. No where on the Groupon does it say we have to be there before 8 so we were angry about that. Pretty slow hookah lounge. No one ever came around to really change the coals. When we would ask for drinks and cold mugs for our beer the waitress would kind of just stare at us then walk away. The assistant who didn't speak much English was wayyyyy better than the server herself. We tipped the assistant more than the actual server because she did way more for us. I don't really plan to go back. And my friends were also very disappointed in the service.

I'm a usual hookah smoker and I'm picky when it comes to it so trust me when I say hands down best hookah in Vegas. Close to the strip, open late and beat part it has an open bar. Our waitress's name was "Jackie" very attentive and helpful and gorgeous! I would definitely come back here!

I haven't been to Luna in about two years and this was my first actual time experiencing everything here. I can honestly say that the mint al fakher bowl I smoked is among the top I've had at a hookah lounge in Vegas. I have low expectations when it comes to these lounges and Luna played all their cards right. If like to mention Vernie our server. If you like fast and attentive, that's her. I'll definitely be coming back. Thanks Luna and Vernie! :)

We went during the day & it was a great low-key hangout. The staff was great, consistently checking on our hookah coals & brought us more pita bread for our hummus trio plate.
We used a groupon and for $18 we got a hookah, hummus trio plate & a pot of tea. It was good for up to a group of 4. It was a great deal for what we got! It was too warm outside for hot tea so they were happy to bring us glasses with ice to go with our tea. We ordered green tea & it was perfectly sweet.
I plan on coming back here again on my next trip to Vegas.

This place is Okay.. their prices are cheap compared to other places and they open till 4am. However it is a bit small and their seatings are very awkward, U feel too close to the person thats next to u...
A little hidden next to the encore but I'm definitely a fan.  There's small bites and a dope bar! The hookah isn't expensive at all. Definitely will be going back!

Good food terrible service boring music making me fall asleep nobody moving around at all weak drinks  I recommend getting food if you come here that's about it the security guard from outside came up to me seeing how I'm doing more then the waitress good prices food and drinks

Had a great time here. Very attentive service from Jackie.

Looks like we made it here on 90s reggae night, which was great.
Friendly staff who will cater to your needs and make sure your experience is enjoyable. If you're unsure of a flavor feel free to ask! Great way to cap off a night in Vegas!

when it come to hookah lounges. this is as good as it gets. they have an amazing customer service. not mentioning the beautiful servers. they are on top of everything. table checks very often. ensuring the best service you could ask for. coal service extremely fast and reliable aswell. this is a high class lounge compared to other lounges around the las vegas valley. very clean. very sanitized swell.
Pretty chill place! Hookah is flavorful! Have awesome fruit bowls and the people are super attentive. Mandy was our girl so helpful with recommendations. Thank you Mandy! We will be back very soon!

What I don't like about hookah lounges is it never tastes as good as at home would assume due to not cleaning,  but Luna is a great spot. All the equipment was clean and tasted great. I will definitely be coming back next time I'm on the strip.
"We only have bottled water" yup! This place sucks if they want to only provide bottled water
Awesome place...friendly servers and great hookah. Will come back again. Do check it out if you are visiting Vegas.
My friend and I came here on a Saturday in the afternoon. It was a nice place to escape the heat. Strawberry mojito was light and refreshing and the hookah was great.
Nice lounge very friendly environment ... Definitely recommend this spot our server Jackie is courteous and helpful

The staff at Luna was fantastic. Our party was quite large, about 20 people, and the staff did an excellent job making sure our orders were put in on time, our drinks were received in a short time, and our hookahs were refreshed. I especially appreciated the good music that the DJ played, which eventually got our group up and dancing. 

Luna is a great place to spend the night in Vegas if you're trying to avoid the pretentiousness of clubs. The music is loud, the drinks are strong, and the people are great. Although we didn't order food (we just had dinner at Allegro), I'm sure it would've been great. 

I will definitely be back!

*Check in for 15% off your first hookah*

I really liked the atmosphere of Luna lounge! If you come alone like I did, they have comfy couches that are big enough for 2 people. If you come with a bigger group they have larger booths you can sit in. The DJ that was there Thursday night (DJ Infinite) played a good mix of music. I like that the music videos play on the screens at the same time. It was calm at first and started getting busier later during the night. They have a dance floor, a lot of different hookah flavors, full bar and food menu. My main waitress was really friendly, idk her name but she's Asian with red hair. She suggested I try the "skills on the rocks" hookah flavor and I really liked it. I ordered two strawberry Martinis and a jolly rancher shot, both are great. 

I didn't like that there was only one man working the hookah. A few times I had to track him down to change the coals and I think they were understaffed in general.

great hookah!!! 

Nice place and great music !!!!
Great food too...
always the best 
















.......
liked it 

Thank you

walked into this place and the music was incredibly loud. First off, i'm a metalhead so I usually listen to loud music but this was over the top-loud. So loud, your body will let you know. My ears wouldn't stop ringing for a half hour after. My group sat down and we left after 5 min. There's loud and then there's LOUD. I noticed that no body was talking to one another. Everyone was just sitting there. I don't know about you but hookah is all about relaxing and being social. In this place, it's impossible. I couldn't hear the person next to me. Never will go back.
Great atmosphere, good hookah, good music, and good hummus.   We found this place on groupon, it's a really chill spot and we loved it. We will be coming back here when we go back to Vegas.

I came in with a few friends right when they opened after trying to escape the Vegas heat. The gentlemen who assisted us was very personable and knowledgeable! He recommended a hookah flavor and a tea that would pair well with the flavor. We ordered a hookah that was a house mix, a moroccan mint tea, and a long island iced tea. Within the first 30 minutes the place became pretty busy!!

Overall the service was quick for the items we initially ordered. I would just recommend they come around more often with coals :-)
Absolutely hands down the best Hookah lounge Iv'e ever been to.  Truly a gem in Vegas!
I like to smoke hookah at Luna Lounge , is best place in Las Vegas I some duple apple mix Alfakher with Alnakalh we drink tea and I like couch more comfortable, food amazing also I like music .

Ambience is up to the mark. They have a bunch of flavor options. Yasmine's service is good, ask for her!

We went on a Saturday afternoon and it wasn't too crowded, about right number of people, perfect if you want to have a peaceful conversation with your buddies.

Music is good and they have screen playing songs.

So I'm visiting Vegas with my bestie to celebrate my bday. We made concrete plans for everyday and hitting up Luna was on our list. We came here Saturday night bout 7pm and it was about 5 people in there but it's a cute spot and it was still early so I ignored that fact. So we walked in and no one greeted us we kinda just wondered and found our way til eventually a guy came over and asked so you guys want a hookah, ummmm why else would we be there??!!!! So we answered and informed him we had a groupon so he said ok and set us up with the hummus, tea and pitas.  

Everyone working there just looked lost and like they didn't know what they were doing. I say that because we realized after we hit the hookah a few times that the waiter DIDN'T provide a tip to go on the neck of the hookah and that's when I was grossed out. That is gross and you would think that if you are going to run this kind of joint your staff should be trained better. due to that I didn't want to eat or finish da hookah so we just paid and left and this after we had to run down the waiter.

oh and I ordered a crown and coke that was $12 that tasted like straight water.

A fan they are nice and service is a little slow but its a lounge. great hookah and great products need to turn down music a bit when its slow times, but all in all it is a good place to hangout and dance.
Great place to have a chill time with drinks. Not to bad price. Would definitely come back

It's in a strip mall. It's tucked in a corner. If you are looking for luxury go somewhere else. If you are looking for reasonably priced hookah and some fun, come here. This is a two part review. We came Saturday and returned Sunday. Saturday had a live DJ who was pretty legit. He played a nice mix that appealed to the mixed crowd. The patrons were fun too. No wait and our hookah was nice all night. The plus is that they serve food as well as having an open bar. There's a small dance floor. Mandy was our server Sunday. Super sweet, friendly, and attentive. This is a great place to chill, enjoy hookah, have food and drinks, and dance when your jam comes on. Totally a fan of coupons and there was a 15% off coupon for checking in. Try code 69 mixed with blue mist flavor. Minty and has a nice deep aftertaste. Overall a cool experience and no complaints from me. I'm rating 4 stars because 5 is just almost impossible for me :)

Came here after my bachelorette party and it was amazing! The service was incredible, the owner was generous, the hookah was bomb (and we're Arab so we should know the difference!), location was easy to find and they served alcohol. How could it get any better? I live in LA and next time I take a Vegas weekend.. You know where I'll be! Thanks Luna Lounge.. You guys rock!

Marz is an awesome hostess! We had a great time in Las Vegas! This is an awesome hookah lounge and I will definitely be back on my next visit. Trust and believe I will recommend this establishment to everyone to visit. They offered live entertainment which was great as well. This was such a treat. Thank you for such a great experience. Let's see how others measure up to this spot! Keep up the good work!!! A++++!

Just had an awesome experience at this hookah lounge! We got the fresh pineapple hookah with an ice hose and it was super tastey and smooth. Jackie waited on us and she was very helpful. It's clean here and really chill. They use coconut coals which is another plus. Definitely recommend this place! Be sure you try one of the fresh fruit hookahs :)
Best hookah lounge in town! Location is prime, staff is great, music is great ! Late nights on Wednesdays are  lit. See Belen at the bar ;)
The place almost empty and the take you and set you outside in the heat,I tried the salmon dish and it's delicious The hookah its not so great

I would give this establishment a zero if I could. From the staff not being attentive to the broken door that remained opened right next to us smoking hookah (mind you it's 60 degrees). Food was cold, the hookah was not bad, but definitely avoid this place if you can. I asked them to play Drake and the manager told me he will not be playing any R&B music because he is trying to appeal to the "Persian" crowd. I would advise you not to spend your money here.

Luna Lounge was an experience.  The servers and bartenders were friendly.  Although when I tried to use my yelp coupon the server didn't know I could use it without having to order the hookah.  We were waiting for another couple, but wound up meeting them somewhere else.  The appetizers are ok and the drinks had fun names.  This spot is trendy, yet relaxed.  If I wanted to do hookah, I would give it another try.

My yelp coupon issue got resolved by the manager and we were soon on our way to have tacos from El Gordo, just around the corner.

I think this is a good spot if you are out for some hookah and it looked like locals visit this most of the time.
Great establishment! Marsha is the MOST AWESOME Bartender/Server EVER! The food is great! My favorite is Salmon flatbread. If you like a

So we've seen this new hookah lounge on yelp and decided to give it a chance.. 
As we walked in, the place wasn't busy but still no one say hi nor telling us we can have a seat.  
After 5-6 minuets of waiting for help, my boyfriend went looking for a servant and brought him to out table. 
It took to long for the food and hookah to get to our table, the food wasn't as good and we thought it was gonna be and the hookah had no flavor.  
As well, we didn't feel like we got a good value for our money. 
The reason why I give this place two stars and not one is because it's a beautiful place, I'm giving it two stars.  
I usually don't make negative reviews such as this one, but we had a bad experience there waiting for ever and getting bad hookah and not really good food. 
Thanks.

I enjoy smoking hookah frequently. As I'm always at hookah lounges every weekend. Being from California, visiting a friend in Las Vegas. I needed a fix and came here after reviewing local hookah bars. The atmosphere is relaxed, the music is good. With a dance floor & bar it serves both sides of having fun. Only downside from my opinion is the lack of hookah brands. Most blends contain haze which I don't like. And that you're not allowed to have tongs to move your coals. But overall I enjoyed my time. Next time I come to Vegas; I wouldn't mind returning for a fix.

Nice change of pace from my usual hookah bar, but really loud! Be prepared to yell! Also, the hookah wasn't the best and the food was not so good! Pretty unfortunate for the prices they charge. Our tab was for 2 people and rang out at over $100...for hookah.
Good vibes smooth hookahs great service and to too it all of amazing music and good atmosphere
This is great spot to have some great hookah with great ambiance.It's not that far from the Vegas strip.If you want great hookah with good customer service then this is the spot.

When i took a vacation out to Vegas in June we were looking for things to do. And we stumbled upon Luna Lounge. 

First sight it looks like a cool place.. Nice vibe and nice tv inside for music and video and very spacious. I think we went on a slow night so it wasnt as fun..

Drinks: 
I ordered Whiskey sours it was prepared so well i ordered two lol.

Hookah:
The hookah was good. The guy was a little slow on changing it but.. I won't complain so much about it. 

Overall if we went on a better night i think that place would have been a poppin spot..
Good bar service but worst hookah experience ever. Super harsh the whole time. They tried to help but didn't make it better.

Very disappointing night. Our group of 3 arrived around 10 pm and we were the only table there tonight (Monday). We bought a groupon but realized it had to be used before 7pm so our server stated we could use the $10 off $20 that is featured on yelp. So we ordered a hookah, a beer, a coke and 3 waters. We were kind of surprised that she brought out 3 bottles of Voss rather than 3 tap waters. We looked at the menu and saw the water is $3 each. Ok no big deal but it would have been nice to know you only offer bottled overpriced water. The hookah was decent but we had to ask multiple times for a server to come over and rotate the charcoals. Also we planned on ordering the Luna trio but the server said they only had hummus, no tabouli or ceviche. The hummus platter was pretty good. Finally we ask for the bill and everything on the receipt was prices incorrectly. We were charged $5 each for the water although the menu said  $3. When we pointed that out to the server she said "thats a typo, no one's ever pointed that out before" umm.. ok.. also the price of the hummus was $1 more than the menu stated and no discount on the bill. So we had her adjust the bill after showing her the menu and would only give us the 15% discount even though she said we would be getting  $10 off as the website states. I am not a fussy customer but you would think we'd get decent service since we were the only table there and not try to slyly overcharge us. Disappointed and will not return.
Awesome hookah place.  Service is excellent. Appetizers and tea are fantastic as well
Good hooka good service. Gets lit at night but much older crowd.  The fruit salad is great. Opens early 11 am, for that quick morning hookah

We were in Vegas celebrating a few birthdays and After looking for either a cigar lounge or a hookah bar we came across this lounge on yelp.   From the time we got In the staff Jordan and Roni was awesome.   They helped answer questions about the flavors and were so nice.   The food was AMAZING!!  (They wanted to kiss the cook).  This by far will be the most recommended spot from us.
One of the greatest hookah bar I've ever been to! It was my sister's 21st birthday and they did the great job! Nice staff, great atmosphere! Special thanks to their dear manager!

I came here first time. nice place ,good service , good music. Hookah is very good n not expensive.
Now this will be my fav hookah bar.

This is the best hookah lounge with bar and DJ in Vegas I've tried looking for more local ones in the area but it seems like there's not any like this one so I usually always end up driving down to the strip just for this hookah lounge to enjoy with my friends! I recommend this place for anyone who wants to chill or party and have fun without dealing with all the hassle.

Came to Vegas and wanted to hit up a hookah lounge so my boyfriend and our group tried this place out. My roommate said he's been coming here for the last 2 nights so we gave it a try.

I smoke daily so my expectations were a little high. The hookah and the customer service was alright. The waitress didn't even look me in the eye when I asked her a question but tended to everyone else nicely, lol. 

Wish the music was louder and they played more variety but you could request songs and they'll play it for you. After half an hour, my friend came back from the bathroom and found a cockroach crawling on her seat. The waitress seemed not too surprised but another waitress came to tell our party that we could get a complimentary hookah the next night if we came back, so we did. It wasn't that big of a deal and the way the other waitress handled it made the vibe better. 

Hookah price is ok but a water is almost $5...soda is cheaper. Different people tend to your hookah and change out the coals, the guy who helped us out both nights was nice and helpful.

Extremely disappointing place. Hookah smoke was lousy. It burned the entire time. They don't leave tongs so you cant adjust the coals to your liking and the server hardly ever came by. They also rushed me out the door by making me pay before I was even done smoking. Terrible experience and will never go back.
It was decent. Drinks took forever to get and the hookah took even longer to get them to do it right.

I heard bout this place through a friend. I just started getting into hookah. Came on a Saturday which is hip hop night. Unfortunately wasn't real busy. Still played good music and drinks and service was great. 

Atmosphere fit the location which is off Las Vegas Blvd . Just after the encore and Wynn casino. Same side. Definitely a Vegas feel. There was no cover charge. Awesome! They do have an area where you can dance if you feel like. Very hip environment. Friendly staff. 

Regular hookah is $25 and if you want to get fancy with real fruit it's $35 if they don't run out. They also serve food. They stay open til 4am unless slow they close early. 

Wednesday is Latin night. Thursday and Friday are hip hop. Sunday is 80 music and they have a belly dancer. I will definitely come back. Overall a cool place to chill.
Marz was very friendly and attentive. The atmosphere is great. Service is great hookahs came out quick and my next trip out i will definitely come back.

Luna Las Vegas is where it's at right now for Hooakh lounge, not only does it have Hookahs but it bar service and food service. The staff is great, really chill. Live events, there's Latin night which gets really popping every Wednesday nights. Comedy night is hilarious hosted by Mike P on every Tuesday nights. Sunday nights are Arabs nights live music band and have a belly dancer as well really cool, bring friends, family. Good place to meet new people. This is somewhere I recommend for anyone to just chill and have a good time
Nice atmosphere, but it's smells weird from the combination of hookah smoke and food.

Ill trained and inattentive staff. Wait staff was completely disorganized. Took 5 mins to be acknowledged for seating and then another 10 mins to have our order taken, all while having to endure super loud obnoxious music. Since I found these guys in Groupon I was disappointed to learn that they did not honor the Groupon after 10 PM. Really lame as there was no mention of that.

Really nice lounge.  The hookah lasted really long atleast and hr. I was here on a Thursday night with my sister as first timers and to start with the positive.  It happened to be ladies night or something where drinks were free until 12 so i had an hr to catch a free buzz.. but i think the waitress had an hr to dodge us.  Moving on to the hookah the waitress suggested something with some mint.  I felt it was really minty. Overall the space was nice a bit stiff for my type of drunken hypeness (standing occasionally to dance and spank my sister)  no one was dancing only the occasional arm wave.  Id come back.... earlier for massive free drinks muaaahh haahaa!

I love this place, its amazing, great hookah spot. Very clean and the tapas are excellent.   Definitely a solid place to get some food, drinks, and hookah!  and the staff was so friendly not to mention the price is very reasonable. 
I had great time there and i will Definitely return for mor fun time !!!!

Went at 1AM on Friday. They only had patio seating. That was fine however, I spent 20 mins outside ignored in 100 degree weather. I never got service after being seated so I eventually got up and left. Complained at the door and they said "oh."

Great place to hang out with friends and family , thx Jackie for the great service the pineapple and orange hookah with a hint of mint was the best. The food and price was great I will be back great place just to hang and chill !

I am a local, that loves this place!
Of course,  I brought a visiting friend here to enjoy a relaxing Sunday at 6 pm before flying out early in the AM. 

1. Ambiance is sexy. Black walls, leather coaches, mood lights in appealing colors ( fuchsia,  gold, magenta,  cool blue), modern glass tables, perfect lounge music, large televisions to catch the games,  and exposed ventilation. 5/5

2. Food is tasty and light! I ordered the ginger basil shrimp pasta . My date tasted it and ordered one for himself ! The ginger and basil really meshed well with the light and creamy  sauce. The portions were perfect,  not enough to take home but filling! $10  4/5

3. Drinks are on point here! I had the Strawberry Luna $12 . It arrived in a stemmed goblet . 5/5

4. Hookah was long lasting and tasty. Helpers came by to refill coals occasionally.  We did not need a hookah refill.  We enjoyed the mint/raspberry flavor. 5/5

5. Service was the only thing that was spotty. I'm getting used to the fact that Las Vegas highers based on looks and NOT customer service. Our waitresses were beautiful but definitely not service oriented or interested.

We were refused  ice water . The waitress said it was because they had not ever changed the filter??? Another said that she would get in  "trouble" for giving it to us. We paid for a bottle of Fiji  $5 and upon further questioning were offered 2 free Fiji bottles from management. We were never offered refills on drinks and had to walk up to the bar despite being one of only 3 couples in the establishment. 2/5

Overall: 3/5 - service is EVERYTHING!
Jasmine was a very great and welcoming bartender host and waitress we had an amazing experience

Had such an amazing experience here ! Our server Luis was an awesome guy! So attentive and made sure we had a great experience here! We want every server to be like him !!!! Thank you for being so positive and cared for us!!!

Great place, the hummus is excellent! Hookah was good, we got the OMG one. Nice atmosphere, prices are reasonable for the location. Seating is relaxed and music was average. We had a good time all in all. We might be back but it doesn't really stand out.

My only gripes about this place:
- To get the 15% off you have to write a 5 star review (wtf really?)
- The toilets STINK as soon as you walk in. Eggorama
- Nobody checked out coals during our visit
- Kinda hard to pay our bill, the lady kinda walked off and started cleaning lol
- no liquid creamer, only powder
Awsome music yummy hookah cool fire shots u can come in a group of friends or just a one on one date and its always postive vibes
Cool vibe. Chill atmosphere. Great burger  and attentive service. The hookah set ups are cool too with a great selection of options for set ups and flavors etc. A definite gem on the strip.
We were promptly greeted when we walked inside. The lounge is absolutely beautiful and the music is great! The server Jackie was very helpful and offered plenty of recommendations.

One of the worst hookah lounges I've ever been to. I'm from sf and I've been to every hookah lounge in CA. The place is REALLY nice but the management is horrible. I guess the owner was there and when we walked in we asked is it self seat or they seat us  he just said just go sit down ? Really rude much. The waitress or host whatever you want to call her do sent know a tad bit about hookah. I asked for a specific flavor she said they don't have it. Then later when I got my nasty tasting hookah. The guy was like oh ya we do have that flavor. And didn't even bother to change mine. I got 2 hookahs and each one was worse than the other. Place has potential just needs the right people to run it. And also the dj sucks my 8 year old nephew can pick and mix better music. Never commin back

Finally, a good hookah spot on the Strip!

I checked out Luna Lounge with a few of my friends this week. A lot of hookah lounges in town try to market themselves as a nightclub but few succeed in capturing that party atmosphere. Fortunately Luna is one of spots that is able to deliver on that promise. The place looks like a nightclub complete with a dancefloor, DJ, and bottle service. A sleek modern interior with comfortable seating and impressive sound system makes it a fun place to chill and smoke up. 

We used the $10 for $20 yelp deal which is definitely worth it considering they charge $22 for one hookah. At this price they probably one of the most expensive hookah spots in town. The $35 they charge for a fruit bowl is just plain ridiculous. The hookah was pretty good, the bowl and refill we got each lasted for about an hour and they came by regularly with fresh coconut coals. 

Service was excellent, Luna looks to be family owned and they came by to check up on us pretty often. They also serve food and thankfully feature a full bar which is rare among hookah lounges.

Remember to check in for the 15% off Yelp deal!
I love this lounge. It is very cheel very good prices and Jackie is amazing...  The music is amazing, the food is to die for.
Great hookah lounge. Jackie provides great service through the whole night and was very friendly. Definitely coming back when we're in Vegas.

I'm a daily hookah smoker. I know what's a good hookah from a bad hookah. And this place by far has the best tasting hookah flavors in Vegas. 

The waitress "Marian" is super nice and super friendly. Very attentive also. 

I strongly recommend this place.

I've been avoiding writing this review for over a month. I have been to Luna on more than one occasion. The first few times were great. They play a great variety of music and they even have a belly dancer some nights. The girl who sat us at our table was super friendly and our server was great! Very attentive and checked on us frequently. I loved this place so much I decided to take my friends with me. We went on a Saturday night so it was fairly busy and we opted to sit outside where it was more quiet. The security guard, who was a younger guy kept approaching our table and making inappropriate comments about my friend, at one point he pointed at her stomach and said, "I have a friend who is a personal trainer you look like you need it." It's been nearly two months and I still get infuriated when I hear this comment. We were minding our our business and not causing any problem and the unwanted comment was rude and offensive. I am so disappointed because I liked this place but I won't be coming back because of the disrespectful security guard.
I came here when they barely open. Great customer service. The atmosphere is chill.  I come here & there. Roxanna is good waitress , if you decide to go hit her up.

I honestly don't understand how this place got good reviews . Personally if I'm spending 100 dollars , I'd prefer to sit in my own booth . They try to cram everyone close together and the entire universe hears your conversations. Definitely not a good hangout spot . Also drinks were expensive but with no liquor in them . Don't go here !!!!

Went on a Sunday & it was great. Friendly staff, great music and overall chill atmosphere. Had blue mist hookah flavor with an ice tip. Everything hit pretty smooth & had a great tasting pot of Persian tea. The only downside is that although it was pretty empty, the staff weren't too attentive after we received our hookah. I had to ask one of the workers to fix the hookah because it got too harsh & all they did was blow on the coals instead of the piece. Also, they did not replace the coals in our entire time there. I would definitely go back I just would like more attention from the staff.

Fabulous place. Love Jacque. Come see her here. Great hookah
 Great service. The hookah attendant is very detailed and makes your hookah experience great.
