This place was horrible 
Service was horrible .. took 20 minutes to bring out our hookah .. I am middle eastern I am too familiar with hookah it doesn't take more than 5 minutes to prepare e everything with the coals... when they brought out the hookah after a out 2 - 3 minutes it began to burn 
They don't leave tongs around for us to take care of the issue ourself that took another 5 minutes for someone to come around.
We were ready to leave our bill was 47.62 for one hookah and two drinks .. we gave our waitress 60 bucks and we waited and waited for her to bring our change the dumb waitress thought we gave her a 12 dollar tip... horrible experience!

Nothing but amazing service. Every time I go the bartender take care of my guest and I. The 1 best hookha bar In Vegas. Don't wait your time going anywhere else's great hookha N drinks. I love the management Jen & Jackie they show the best customer service!!!! I give them a 10star for showing the love and best service a customer could ask for.

Wonderful music, mainly middle eastern with a hip hop twist for a Sunday night.  Decent hookah, actually, the best I've had in Vegas!  Its only slightly annoying that you don't get your own tongs to adjust at your will, but the coal guy comes when called, so that was nice.  Belly dancing...She taught a few of the customers to dance along which was cute, but It was just a great dancing atmosphere.  Drinks were great.... I had coffee which was pretty good (a little weak for my taste, but okay) and a Mango Madness which was awesome... i had 2 of those =) and dessert good!  I had split a cheesecake with my friend and we couldn't finish it.  Didn't eat dinner, but I heard food was wonderful.  The employees are super nice.  And at midnight, when the international soccer game game started, they had it playing on the screens.  Pretty cool.  Definitely coming back!!  I heard that Wednesdays were the best to go... not sure myself.

Luna is great lounge to be at if you want a great atmosphere and have some fun with friends. Betty, Sam, and David made sure we had great time. They have great customer service skills.  I highly recommend this lounge, you'll have lots of fun!!!!!
If you know anything about hookah stay away from this place!!!! The only flavor they serve is charcoal!!!
Vegas peeps come see Jackie here at Luna it's the best place to smoke hookah , best music and great service

HORRIBLE. Server Yvonne will
Lie to your face about pricing. Originally apon entry we asked how much for shots (specified on which) and she proceeded to say $5. When our bill came the shots were $11 each. When we spoke to the manager she was rude and refused to even hear anything. I would never recommend this place it had rude staff and the severs especially Yvonne will lie to add up the tab

Based on my research, Luna Lounge is the only LVS hookah available during the day.

Altogether, I had a pot of green tea, fruit plate, hummus trio and house select hookah. All were fresh and tasty.

Not a bad day at the lounge...watching sports with a little beat in the background.

The service was awesome!

I'll definitely return.
Great place with a very cool decor and vibe. There is a comedy show on Tuesday.   I feel very swagalicious when I hang here ;) #GrubLyfe
I would give this a 5 start rating, but it's not that many people who come here because it's so ducked off on the street. You would never see this place from the street. Nice hostess Mariah.
Had a great time,  Jaques our server was super sweet. Would definitely come back. Try the apple ...

Thank you Ronny for our new addiction. Yesterday was our first experience with hookah, last night we had the mango and today we had your recommendation of the " frozen lake". What an amazing time, cool f$cking place and the atmosphere is a million bucks! The price is so reasonable but I felt sad that we could only spend less than an hour and a half here ( because of our agenda) whilst we could've been here for much longer. Glad my husband came across this treasure.

I've been here a few times before. The food is great, portions are just the right size and the prices are decent, but what makes me go back every time is their incredible pineapple hookahs. My buddies and I are in love with the hookahs they make here.  I talked to the owner, and he said someone named "PEDRAM" is the genius behind this work of art. So make sure when you go there, you ask for him to make your hookah. Im sure you'll love it.

I want a refund.

Horrible service. Took like 10 minutes to even see an employee and then another 40 minutes to get a hookah. Took another 20 minutes to flag down an employee to get food and another 20 minutes to get a cheesecake and some Oreos..... 

The place is really nice and clean (except for the bathrooms) but it isn't worth it. The quality of the hookah is average, nothing special. $24 for regular hookah with a flavor. We got the Frozen Lakes flavor but you couldn't really taste it. 

The music was very low and poor quality. And an employee served us soda with ice when we said no ice and just walked away. 

Overall, very disappointed. We are locals and we had heard very good things about this place. But we were not impressed. We had nobody check on us for over an hour and when we were ready to pay, an employee approached us and said in a rude way, "what do you need?". 

Hoping to com back one day and get the proper service.
Great hookah on the strip! Lots of food options and drinks. The ambiance is very nice and the hookah tasted great. Right next to the Encore!
Bad place specially when crowed. Made us wait a lot before giving us a table.
Staff was nice. Hookah was good. Drinks are typical Vegas strip prices. We ordered the peach flavor sheesh .

This place was really cool when we 1st walked in there was no wait and that place was amazing our server came over like right away asked what did we wanna drink and what kinda hookah. The drinks came fast the hookah did take a while to come out but we didnt mind because it was so obvious they was busy. When we got the hookah it was smooth i have no complaints about this place. Even the staff was very nice i will come back again the nexttime im in vegas
Hey do not leave las Vegas without visiting Jaque at Luna!!! Atmosphere is on point, food is great!!!! Luna gets 2 solid thumbs up!!!

Great atmosphere and friendly staff.  We rode here on the Deuce and got off at the Convention center drive. For around 4pm on a Sunday we weren't expecting much and it was in fact empty but picked up around 6pm. The hookah was large and burned great for the whole 2 hours we were there (I didn't want to leave it behind! Lol); Music was also great and current. We used a groupon and got to try the hummus trio. I truly believe it was 3 sections of the same exact hummus (I tasted no difference) which was disappointing but the music and hookah made up for it. I will definitely be back here maybe on a Friday or Saturday night for a more lively experience!

Amazing atmosphere! Great hookah! A must for hookah smokers!
One of the best hookahs I've had in Vegas and I've tried lots of places. Hand down the BEST for sure!
Thank you Luna staff!

Wow! This place had a perfect hookah, lasted over over 2 hours and that's with no refill. Also, SABRINA, was awesome, great service with a nice smile. Around 11:30ish they had a beautiful belly dancer. Luna hookah had great atmosphere. Very satisfied!
Love this lounge and the amazing customer service especially from my server Belen !!!! She is amazing also Nichole was amazing as well !!!!! I'm

I love this place!!!!! 
There are a lot of events for all moods. Great costumer service. One thing I like the most are the Hookah fruit bowls, are prepared with a sophisticated but with a touch of great presentation that would amaze you every time. Food wise it has a lot of great options from hummus to a great Greek pizza served with your favorite mix or specialty signature drink.
As a fan of Luna Lounge, I invite you to come and have a great fun time at Luna Lounge!!!!
See you there!.

One of the best hookah lounges I've been to so far. Didn't think I would find a place like this in Vegas that fun and chill at the same time. They played a variety of music. The vibe was chill and relaxed. Loved it

We liked this hookah lounge, we actually visited twice on our trip instead of trying a different hookah lounge in the area. The staff was friendly, though when it got busy it could be hard to get the attention of your server. The hookahs were decent and lasted quite a while, though not the best. They also have beer and liquor which was cool, though it was so loud we actually had a mishap with ordering and they charged us for extra beers that we didn't drink, which was a bummer. The reason we went back is actually because of the DJ, I wish I could remember his name. He was awesome, he played such a huge variety of music from older classics to newer hits, even different genres, and he mixed them all together seamlessly. This guy definately knew his music. It's sounds wierd but he was so good, we were basically hyped up all night singing and sometimes dancing on the small space in the front, and neither of us ever dance like that haha. The second night we went to was a cultural night and he played a lot of Arabic music, and the atmosphere was much more lively with lots of people moving, dancing, and singing. Both nights were fun in their own way.

Came here on a Monday night (industry night). The place is nicely decorated and clean. I ordered the Melon Blast w/ Mint for Hookah and the flavor was good and the smoke was smooth. Maysam offered great customer service. This is a great place to take friends who's visiting Vegas since it's on the strip next to Encore Hotel. They have a bar and DJ booth, and offers bottle service I think. Come here early if u just want to chill and relax, come later if u want to party.
Awesome place and great service! Our server knew everything about hookahs and took great care of us. The food was also delicious. New to Vegas or a local, highly recommend this place!
Every time I'm in vegas gotta stop by this place has awesome hookah I love the apple heads here
Great Atmosphere... Best Hookahs... Great Music...Good Food and tasty Drinks ... Highly recommended... Every time I come to Vegas, I definitely stop by Luna... overall A+

Came here tonight and they didn't let us in because one guy out of 6 of us was wearing shorts ..Super dead hookah lounge requires jeans on a Wednesday night.  This place is almost empty! Don't go here. Rude bouncers as well. Go to Rhumb bar better at least they have friendlier people.
Hookah was good and drinks! Good service!! I will def come here again. Had the apple hookah with blue mist.

Been here twice now. If my first visit was anything like my second, I would have never returned. 

First time we came around 11pm on a Saturday night, very small crowd, but we enjoyed our hookahs. My friend I was with had told me they have Kale Pache on Friday nights, I'm not into boiled sheeps head, but I'd be more than willing to come just for the experience. 

After a fantastic dinner at Barrymore, we decided to stop in. It was around 8pm and it was a totally different crowd. The music playing was, um, every other word was the n* word, I mean I like Tupac just as much as the next guy, but can we mix it up? The girl next to us was wearing a sports bra as her shirt. I kept hearing the same word out her mouth as well. 

So this time around...the hookahs sucked. We tried 4 different times, and my friend even gave the guy $20 to see if that would help with the problem. Nope. Cocktail list is kinda crap. And if I'm paying $12 for bottled water, it better be Evian Pure or something of the like. Not Voss. 

Side note, Kale Pache is only during Xmas time.
Really good hookah nice music dance floor and friendly staff really good service great place good prices

This place blows.. once we got to the hookah lounge, it looked like it was closed. We saw a couple of people smoking cigarettes in front of the place, so we decided to get out of our uber, instead of turning back. Once we got in, we were told that it is packed and that the only seating they had was outside patio seating. I was fine with it, but asked to be moved inside once some parties left, they said "of course". We waited 20 minutes, no one came to check on us. My friend and I were the only ones outside, in 95 degree heat, we decided to leave and told the person in front, who responded with "oh.." while I was walking out, a waitress slammed me with her arm while passing, and didn't even say sorry or acknowledge what she did. Never coming back.

I'm being nice and giving this place three stars :) I didn't like the vibe. I feel like it used to be a strip club before haha. Maybe because it wasn't packed. It was sort of dead. The hookah wasn't great. The staff was friendly. We just got tea. I mean tea is tea can't review that really. Umm, what else... They had music playing and videos on the tvs. Literally we left 10 minutes in. I won't be back again. Sorry!!

Great spot to decompress in-between the EDC craziness. It's always a challenge finding a well run, clean hookah lounge while traveling. Thankfully, this wasn't the case with Luna. This spot is as clean and professional as it gets with top tier hookah and a great menu. Definitely a go to anytime I'm in Vegas now. If you're here for a summer weekend or reside in Vegas, make it a point to check out Luna Lounge.
Shit harsh as fuck my boy packs better ish i be coughing up 2Lungs. Try it out but dont say I didnt warn u...

Horrible service, no waitress came to help us i had to to walk  up to the bar myself to order a hookah n drinks. The waitress kept staring at us as she walked  (short blonde hair girl) by and never served us. Waitresses only kiss ass to people they know, guys and reserved bottle service. Dont bother goin here its very small and sucks.
Jackie was great ! Good little spot and great service :-)  we got the orange cream in a orange it was yummy... well defiantly come back!

We arrived around 10pm which we found out later that might be a little too early. Around 11pm this place got busy. Many selections available. They also offering "ice" tip which is great for summer in Vegas. Full service bar and $5 bottle of water definitely make me feel elevated :) 
Staffs are friendly and quick. This will be my new hang out spot.

Ultra cool lounge with nice stiff drinks and a variety of crowds. Comfy enough for a large group, romantic enough for a couple and fun for a group of friends just chilling like us. We ordered the regular hookah ($24) with a red gummy bear flavor. I ordered the Melontini drink and it was very strong and tasty ($12), also the wings and fries ($12). The bottle water is $5 but it's Voss so I get the upcharge. The staff is very friendly, especially our food/drink runner who was very sweet and helpful. Music was good, and had matching videos but I do wish there were people dancing. I am sure this place gets crazy packed in the Summer.

Great place...food, drinks, music & entertainment was amazing.  Staff was great kept oyr coal heated & always checked on us plus the security was helpful & very welcoming making u feel at home knowing that all was good. This is my new spot to be at when wanting to relax and chill.

Saturday night November 2nd 2013 my sons 21 birthday we had a blast I got a room on the strip so no one had to drive all my son wanted to do was smoke hookah yelp says this is the place to go the website says open till 3 I called to make sure they were open we walked pretty far to get there arrived at 1am and we were met at the door by a very bitchy lady stating they were closed as loud music blared in the background and you could see people sitting inside I was livid she was really nasty about it too I was just about to click the check in button until she spoke I will never go back and I know the people that were with us will never go back either

If you are accustomed to hookah in SF, the hookah quality at Luna will disappoint.  The mango was weak and customers are not given tongs to readjust the coals.  Slightly expensive.  The staff was courteous.
Roxana was amazing and I would come back all the time!!! Ask for her. The atmosphere is chill and love it!!!

Went here with a group of friends looking for a place to sit, relax and to avoid the heat. We walked in and was immediately greeted. As it was a weekday, there wasn't too many people here.  We got a fruitbowl and a mix of different flavors and for the price, not too bad! for checking in with yelp i also got 15% off which is an awesome deal.

The place has a nice modern look with great lounge chairs and couches with great lighting. There's a DJ booth in the back for those nights where they hold special events every week. Not too bad of sound system right now.

Service was great, always got checked up on, got a new set of coals right before the previous were about to go out without us asking is perfect. We also got tongs which was perfect, as i like to move the coals around without pulling out a coin or a card.

Their food is a bit pricey, we didn't order any as it was a bit high.

5/5 for great customer service and how the inside looks great, and for those who are out of town visiting if you want your hookah fix, Luna has to be the best, if not only the strip, but Las Vegas.

I just stopped by to check it out and boom. I'm coming back tomorrow, I came in about 11ish am and it was quite and peaceful. ,great staff and amazing flavors. Don't hesitate,I haven't been there when it's late and don't plan too but the time spent there it's so worth it. This is definitely my spot

Loved the lounge! The atmosphere was great and the hookah was excellent! Our waitress Jackie was so great and helped us out a lot! Definitely recommend this place to hookah lovers. We will definitely be returning in the future. :)

Waitress sucked , very bad attitude. Worst customer service ever. $5.00 for a bottle of water. By far worst experience ever. It was posted that they close at 3:00, lights came on at 1:45 and they closed at 2:00.
Great food, awesome music and great service. I will be coming here every time I am in Vegas. Thank you.
This place is amazing. I tried the Hookah and had some drinks everything was perfect and the staff was so friendly not to mention the price is very reasonable.

The hosts were attentive. The atmosphere was amazing, at first. Two things, do not map quest Luna Lounge. It will bring you to the opposite end of the strip. When we arrived at the vicinity, we still had difficulties locating the place. Second thing, comedy night? What's that about? I was there with a group of 15 people. We're enjoying ourselves, having a good time, dancing to the music, enjoying more than a few drinks... Then suddenly the music cuts out & we had to sit through painfully boring stand-up comedians. I would have enjoyed it if they are funny but they are not. The good thing about the show is that it killed our buzz & sobered us up enough to drive. I would recommend visiting Luna Lounge unless it's comedy night.
Great food and atmosphere. Love the hummus and flat breads...desert is a must, they make their own ice cream. Perfect spot to go after the club. I highly recommend it

This place was ok. We ordered double apple and the shisha was way too syrupy. It was hard to inhale from flavor alone, not harshness (and we smoke a lot of hookah so I'm not just being a wimp). The food was also just average. We both had the chicken wrap. Be warned the red peppers are SUPER HOT inside it. The drinks however are strong, and our waitress was attentive. Probably won't be my first choice next time.
My server Martha was freakin awesome for my first hooka experience in vegas. Highly recommened good food good music and atmosphere

I checked the reviews on this spot and they didn't lie.... Great place for an outing, my girls and I recently attended the Luna Lounge for Super bowl weekend and I was extremely pleased with the ambiance and service! Cool atmosphere, very laid back and chill and they also have a DJ that comes in around 10 p.m. I am certain they have different DJ's throughout the week but I must say the DJ we had was awesome and played a variety of joints that  satisfied all taste. We ultimately got bottle service, which I felt was well priced compared to most clubs that want to charge an arm and a leg and with bottle service we were comped the Hookah and I have to recommend the fruit bowl Hookah which is a few dollars more but well worth it. The food menu in my opinion is alright, rather limited though but tolerable. I would also like to recommend David Aranda for all your needs, the guy is super awesome and so accommodating. I would most definitely recommend the Luna Lounge and look forward to going back.
Great place to relax and smoke hookah between having fun down at the strip. Gonna come back whenever we're back in Vegas!

This hookah spot is amazing. The service was superb. I had hookah in the glass hose....the best hookah I ever tried. The owner is super friendly and so are the staff. Definitely will return to this spot on my next trip to Vegas!!!

I always wanted to Hookah. I was in Vegas for my 40th birthday party and decided to make use of the Groupon special that they ran. The place is super chill. The staff was cool and helped us "virgins" out. They were very attentive to us and made sure we were comfortable.  There was 5 of us and we all had a good time. I really enjoyed the Hookah. I wasn't sure what to expect since I read that different people react differently to it. I was pleased. The drinks were good. Beware of the shots! We ordered quite a few and didn't realized that their shots are HUGE! We had a great time!

Worse customer service ever,My sisters and I,Was first time here and we waited 1hr.Twice we brought to staff attention we were waiting still never nothing....So we decided to leave no one didn't seem to care or try n take care of us.Never Again!!!!!!!!!and will pass my experience.
Awesome hookah, nice atmosphere, great music, great service. Keep in mind that you need to plan to call a cab in advance especially on weekends.

I honestly don't know how this place is still in business. I saw all the positive reviews on Yelp and the great customer service, and it was far from it.
My boyfriend and I went there in early January and the service was terrible. No one came to ask how we were doing, they did not refresh the coals and I had to keep asking for someone to do it. Finally, 45 mins later someone comes over to help us and informs us that the hookah is already out. We wasted so much time there just trying to get service. And the place was not busy at all. I kept asking for a waiter and they are all too busy talking to each other. There were 4 waitresses who were just talking to one another and not doing anything. I don't smoke hookah regularly but it was awful. On a previous trip, we tried hookah at the AzuzA Hookah Lounge Tapas & Cafe that is a little off the strip, and that place was amazing. They refreshed the coals constantly and it lasted forever. However, that place had a 2 drink minimum (slightly lame), but honestly the drinks were really good (same with the food) and the hookah was awesome. Worth the money. So when I wanted to try hookah again, we tried it at the Luna Lounge, I was thoroughly disappointed. I would not recommend this place and would def avoid it.
Loved it!  GREAT customer service and atmosphere. Large variety of hookah flavors to chose from and tasty tappas!
Loved this place. We went in for a late night hookah session and had great bar and hookah service in a sexy, comfortable environment. French fries were tasty too.

It was my first hookah experience and Maysam made it a pleasurable one.  My friends in I were in Vegas for an extended girls weekend and this added to a great time. Decor was nice. Place was clean. Music was good. We came in mid afternoon so we had the place all to ourselves and Maysam gave us lessons on how to make the most out of exhaling. ;-)

My first time at a Hookah lounge, and I must say, I would definitely come back to Luna. My friends and I were in Vegas for a birthday weekend and as soon as we walked in, the DJ was going in! I mean the music was on point! We immediately sat down in the Reserved area (which we didnt reserve by the way) but was greeted and immediately served! We had hookah, took pictures, lot's of selfies, and danced the night away! The hookah was cool and fun to try!

This is a very cool place to get social, listen to some music, and just chill.  We went on a Thursday night in late February.  It was pretty slow, but we still had a good time.  The drinks were good, and our pomegranate hookah was smooth.  Good times!
Great service. Good music. Delicious food and good drinks. Definitely my go to hookah spot

First timer & loving the vibe. The ambiance is just right. There is an abundance of hookah flavors including the option for a fruit bowl. The server is very knowledgeable & took her time in finding out which flavors we liked to ensure we picked the best flavor hookah. We will definitely return the next time we are in Vegas.

When I go to a place, I expect to get quality and service and I don't mind to pay for it. After reading all the reviews, I decided to give this place a try. I must say one thing, I couldn't ask for more. On a busy Wednesday night I got the best hookah and a delicious mango martini.

I really like it here,  I'm from Milwaukee and we have a place like this at home., so it was really nice to be here.  The prices were fair and the ambience and decor were great.  They even showed the football game so that was appreciated.  The bathrooms were clean which was excellent. Didn't get a chance to eat any food but I would like to return

Had 5 clients visiting from Jordan in the Middle East. We had a hard time finding a hookah lounge they liked. This was our last attempt, and they ended up liking Luna enough to come back twice! We had a group of 8, so we were given a larger booth. We ordered 6 hookahs, all of which were brought out very quickly. The first two flavors I ordered were out, so I had to settle on a flavor I wasn't exactly thrilled about. However, their selection is quite large. I am just very picky! Our server was a friendly girl who was pretty attentive and always brought drinks when needed. The guy attending to the coals was so on point, we had to give him an extra tip!! We ordered a white pizza which was super delicious. One of us ordered the shrimp cocktail, which was a martini glass filled with dipping sauce, but there was only 2 shrimps! That was pretty disappointing. The live music was great, it was jazz night. So Mister Brother was the awesome live jazz band. I would give Luna 4/5 stars!

Wonderful selection of flavors/hookahs. 
I'm happy with the DJ he was able to play some of the music we requested. 
I wasn't pleased with the drinks not much taste and hardly any alcohol. 
Not a very comfortable place to really-really enjoy but again it is 18+ joint so what can I expect. Customer service could be better.

This place is super chill and laid back. The price is just perfect. And for you guys information it's cheaper to just get a fruit bowl than a regular bowl plus refill. Trust me. Our waitress her name is Crystal so if you ever come here, request for her to serve you. She takes good care of you and makes sure your service here is too the top and well satisfied. The drinks for this place is good. Again, crystal she will hook it up if you want your drink stronger because that's what she did for me. And I ordered whiskey. As far, as the hookah portion. Emmanuel did an excellent job coming in and out making sure the hookah was good and coals were replaced if needed, same goes to crystal. 

This place is indoors and outdoors. It's a perfect get away if you just wanna chill with your friends or what not. It's located near the Wynn in a small plaza on Las Vegas Blvd. so give this place a try and tell them how your experience was. Because it's great!

One of the Top hookah places in Las Vegas. I've been here a number times so I can make a solid review.

1) Where - Its across the street of the Encore, in the shopping plaza, tucked in the corner.
2) Whats inside: All the seats are black leather chairs and leather sofas. 
3) Music: Every night is different. On the weekends, they have a DJ
4) The Hookah: They have all the flavors available. Mix and choose. They are clean and you can even ask for the glass hose (We call it the RPG hose). Get that.. it comes frozen and it cools down the smoke.
5) The Service: The waitresses are incredible and always attentive. Jackie is great.. The hookah guys are always coming by refreshing your calls. In fact, I never had to ever call anyone to refresh my coals.
6) The price: Not expensive at all. Its basically half of what you would normally pay for a hookah at the Rumbar at the Mirage
7) The Food is fantastic and they have a lot of options! Get the Luna Chicken, Fruit Salad, and the wrap
8) The drinks are always made well here. They are priced right.
9) If the inside is too loud (which it can be sometimes) you can sit outside on the patio.
10) Crowd - the place is getting more crowded as word is getting around... I would get there at 10am and been there until 3am.
11) They have security guards here so that's good
12) There is a dance floor and dancing.
13) You can call for reservations and get one of the nice corner seating sofas that are elevated a half a foot off the ground.

first time coming here and the DJ/music and crowd was amazing! relaxed but still amazing energy. they were very welcoming, minus the bouncer with the beard at the front, but that's a given anyway-aren't most bouncer suppose to be semi stern and cautious.

Pretty chill hookah place along the Las Vegas strip. Had A nice relaxing environment with a DJ mixing his own songs with the music videos mixed as well. Ordered two hookahs, mine with double Apple mixed with some Mint and the other Code red. Kind of pricey but not bad for being on the strip.

I was invited to Luna Lounge by a person who believed that he was being paid to promote for the establishment. A very nice gentlemen who seemed to have good intent. He told us what a nice place it was and to come check it out. I was excited that this was a place I could invite friends that are 18+ and I could still have a drink. I invited 3 ladies and we arrived around 9PM.

When we arrived to Luna the gentlemen who had invited us was at the door and welcomed us in. We were seated in front of a nice sized dance floor and bar. The inside of Luna is very nice. The walls are made up grey bricks pattern that looks amazing with the lights. I felt very comfortable in the cushiony chair.  They have VIP looking seating with larger tables. Everything overlooks the dance floor and DJ nicely. The entire place is so cute. If my experiences were better I would be back every weekend just to enjoy the chill ambiance the place has on its own.

Two of the ladies were not 21 and were there solely for hookah. All four of us are college students and are on budgets (much like the rest of America). We liked that the prices for the hookah and the drinks were clearly listed. We even got a discount when we checked in on yelp. 

My 21+ friend and I ordered off of their specialty drink menu. We both ordered two drinks. The  drinks were not the best but not the worst. Long island tasted like a premix. Couldn't complain, we were there for hookah, which was great. The guy serving us and making sure our coals were flipped did a great job.

When we went to pay our bill my 18+ friends said they would take care of the hookah. We brought our check up to the bar to meet our server and asked her if she could charge the hookah separately and let me pay for my drinks as well as my friends. I paid for our drinks and said goodbye to 2 of my friends and my other friend and I left.

The next day I received a call from my two friends who are 18+ telling us how when they were paying for the hookah they were also being charged for 2 alcoholic beverages that I had not paid for. They had to fight with Luna about how they were not responsible for the alcohol and that they are both 18 years old. My friend took care of the two drinks the hookah and left. 

The next weekend I came in with the same friends to talk to our server and to clear the air since we liked the place so much. She was not the same person serving us, but I saw our original server. She was standing at the bar. I would like to say I am just paranoid but when I sat down I saw point at me and told her coworker something. I felt very uncomfortable. I felt like she was talking about me and I didn't order anything. My friends had hookah but I felt we were unwelcome. 

A few moments later there was a fight and we decided to leave. When we went outside we saw someone who worked for the lounge fighting with the promoter who had brought our business in. The man was telling him that he shouldn't get paid because he hadn't worked. I felt very bad for the promoter. 

There was a lot of 18+. The parking lot was filled with people around that age loitering, drinking, and fighting. I would like to say this place is amazing, and I could actually say that..  but as far as the service goes... I'd have to agree with some of the other reviews that say it seems like their are employees in there who aren't sure what they should be doing and kind of just stand around.

I was out in the parking lot smoking a cigarette and the server was walking around with a bill looking for the person who had walked out on it, then I walk in the door and right when you walk in there are three guys that work there standing against the wall laughing, hanging out, not really helping.

My server may have been rude but really she was the only one besides the one fellow who did our hookah who were working.
Come here when I visit my friend in LV...enjoy coming here for good hookah, great music and good customer service! So glad it's so close to the strip!
This place has horrible service and I am not impressed. Sorry, but ya'll ain't all that to be making advertisements during business hours. Customer service should always be #1.
Amazing place. From outside place might look deserted compared to strip. Dont get fooled. Must visit place in vegas

This place deserves 0 stars. The hookah is disgusting, drinks are nasty, and they offer food. How would you like me to eat your food if your tables require me to be bending down to my feet or sitting on the floor directly. The reviews for this place are so misleading. Waste of time.
Came here on a Sunday night . Food , drinks , & hookah . Live DJ at 11p . Staff here is super friendly & consistent . Perfect ! Definitely coming back !
Enjoying ourselves ! Nice vibe and Mandi was amazing. Definitely recommend the blue mist flavor.

Jaqline was horrible at service it took me 7- minutes to get the menus and 22 minute to get our orders in and another couple that was pissed off as well will not be coming here again on a Saturday. If you can't attend to customers in a timely fashion or make sure everything is okay then do NOT WORK! I had to get up out of my chair and ask the manager or boss was in then the escort had to handle everything ! First time coming was good but this time I will remember DO NOT TIP THEM! Horrible service and if you get jaq. On a Saturday I feel bad for you.  NO STAR. And I work at a hookah bar as well so"being busy and short staffed "IS NEVER AN EXCUSE.
Great atmosphere and quality hookah. I went there for a friends birthday and the music and vibe was just right. I've been a regular ever since. Jackie and Jesse were awesome as well.
Friendly staff, good music. Great place after hours if you just want a chill environment to unwind for the night
Pretty chill place, they have a great variety of hookah to choose from. The hookah is pretty good it's not harsh like and the customer service is pretty fast and great. I'll definitely be back!
I had a great time here especiAlly during the day time!!  Brought all my friends and Marian was a sweetheart (hopefully I spelled it right) great drinks and hookah!!

We found this place on yelp and decided to check in out while in Vegas. First, it's right next to Encore in a small shopping plaza and it can be easy to miss if you're not looking carefully. We got here at a descent hour and we had to wait a few minutes to be seated. The place was a nice spot with these low sitting couches and chairs and there was loud club music blaring. The hookahs were huge about 4 feet tall, so careful not to knock it over. Overall it was kind of a strange experience, the hookah was pretty good and the guys were okay about refilling and replacing the coals, but I felt they were more attentive to tables that were shedding out more money with more people. But hey that's vegas right. It was kind of hard to talk to our friends in this place because the music was so loud! So just know that if you're coming here to chill and have some hookah you might not be able to talk to them.

I am a regular Shisha smoker, almost daily and I was first worried that I wouldn't find a decent place in Las Vegas, until today.

If you are staying at the Wynn/Encore, this is a waking distance away and I am not lying when I say this is one of the best Shisha I had in the U.S. 

Very well done and very much in line with Hookahs I had Saudi, Dubai and others.

The atmosphere is cool like a chill lounge, didn't try the food so I can't help you here.
Fun spot with great hookah. The chicken & potatoes ate great and the nachos.  Karina is a real sweetheart.

Ist eine nette gehobene Location. Die Musik war angenehm, der Rauch der Shishas wurde zuverlässig nach außen befördert, das Essen war auch lecker und alles in allem war es eine der besten Shisha Bars die ich hier in den USA bisher gesehen habe. Man kann auch draußen sitzen, aber leider nicht gleich nach dem öffnen, sondern erst Nachmittags, wenn die Angestellten draußen mal gemütlich aufgebaut haben... Das hat mir doch etwas Missfallen... Die Preise sind natürlich aufgrund der Lage und Location etwas hoch, aber ich finde es dennoch auf jeden Fall einen Besuch wert.
Amazing , Very excellentelly , clean and Professionally managed special Thanks to Jay and Vick.

Came on Tuesday to chill on my birthday to do some hookah and maybe dance but it turned out to be a Comedy Night. We didn't expect that at all. The comedians were mediocre. Very few laughs. The Hookah was decent though.
The food was good, staff was great and fast. The place is clean and well organized. I will come back next time in Vegas.
Marian provided us with excellent service! Great atmosphere and reasonable prices! A great chill and relaxed place...music was really good too! I would recommend to my friends!

I mean... the place was alright. 

One thing I definitely didn't like was how the charcoal was caged, and no tongs were provided with the hookah. We had no control of our hookah in terms of rotating, dusting, fixing our hookah that we payed for. 

The hookah didn't hit as good as it could have if we were in control of the charcoal, that's for sure, but at least the server was nice enough to do it for us every time we asked. He wouldn't get annoyed.
 
You also have to realize that you're in Vegas. It's not really known for serving great hookah. Exceptional as best, and I probably will come again one day because I'm a fiend.

We originally came to sit and they told us it was sold out. They said let me see what we can do. They finally sat is and they were nice and realy friendly. We sat outside originally and we ask the. To take us Inside as it was really cold. And they did even though they said it was sold out. But they had many available seats at 1:45 am. But because we didn't order much they said sorry guys we need the seat as it was reserved. But no one was waiting out side and seats were available inside, so not sure why they asked us to leave. I am guessing because our bill was not so high as they wanted. 
I am just upset they did that and the hookah is not that good.
Great service, vibe and flavors. One of the must go places in Vegas. The music is great and supports the overall service there.

Great place 
Service was slow at first but he made up for it by letting me smell samples before ordering. 
Ordered drinks and nachos.
Nice vibe 
Will recommend

Loved this place...conveniently located near hotels.  Hookah hits well and didn't burn out immediately. Customer service was excellent! Richard was our server and was able to accommodate our needs. Delicious banana split and chocolate mousse cake! Will def return!

First time here for Tuesday night comedy hosted by Mike P. The crowd was very mixed and the show was not only FREE but FUNNY!

The menu offers healthy and non healthy options which is awesome. 

The interior if modern and classy, overall great place,clean, fun atmosphere!

Comedy night was great! Host was very funny.  Plenty of hookah flavors and options.  Drinks are priced right.  Very comfortable seating. 

Our server, Heather was great. She kept checking in on our drinks and hookah!

I'll start off by saying that we were in Vegas for the Hookah Expo Worldwide hosted by Hookah John. So there was all sorts of people in the industry from lounge owners, to tobacco manufactures, to online vendors to, the end consumer or the "Hookah Enthusiast." So we visited five lounges over the weekend the only one we kept going back to was Oasis Hookah Lounge. 

Review: To get the check in offer, you had to give the name of the server and say " _____ was awesome" in a review (not just check in, which is against Yelp policy). 200$ for non smokable hookah,  drinks were on point, interior is very nice, bathrooms were clean. Was more of a club scene but I could still talk to my group which was awesome. They carry Haze which is actually a really decent brand I would rate above Starbuzz and Al Fakher but below Trifecta, Ugly, and Alchemist. If packed right the bowls can last 1-2 hours with foil and coconut coals, longer if your using an HMD such as a Phoenix or Lotus. The problem was it wasn't packed right because we had two separate hookahs of What-A-Mint which is a creamy peppermint flavor. One hookah had no peppermint taste whatsoever, the other one did have some minty taste but not up to What-A-Mint potential. The other plus with this lounge is they use Coconut Charcoal instead of quicklights unlike a lot of lounges. That's why I see the potential to get even better they care about customers enough to use better coals. The reason they got 2 stars even with all the positive I had to say about the place is because they are advertised first as a hookah lounge, so when the hookah was this bad I'm basing my review mainly on that aspect. I would not go here for hookah but I would go for drinks.

My friends and I came out to this Hookah spot for Hip Hop night.   We had a great time and great service.  We had the basil ginger pasta and stuffed jalapeños.  We had a great time and really enjoyed everything.  The place was poppin'.  I think we will go tonight for Latin night.   Samri is a great server.  She's very polite and quick with the service.

My boyfriend randomly found this place on Yelp. He's been dying to do Hookah with me and we never had the chance to do it since we dont see each other too often. Honestly, I have never done Hookah nor that I ever wanted to, but I guess coming with him didnt really matter much to me. I have seen friends do Hookah but it never really piqued my interest. I'm just not into 'smoking' of any kind.

Before entering, they check your ID to make sure youre old enough to enter the facility. Upon entering, our server sat us on one of the tables with comfy sofa. I dont know much about Hookah so boyfriend ordered and did everything. I think we got Peach flavor with the Ice Hose. He said Ice Hose makes it easier to smoke since you dont feel the 'heat' when you inhale/exhale.

The girl across from our table was curious about our Ice Hose and asked the server for it but unfortunately, they only had one at the store. I guess a lot of them dont know about it or demand is very very low. Ice stayed cool for almost entire time we were there (more than an hour) and it was worth the investment.

Best part of Luna was that you can drink and eat while doing Hookah. Boyfriend and I just grabbed beer and that was good enough. I saw their menu with many different cocktails so ordering a cocktail doesnt seem bad of an idea!

Place is clean and they keep coming to your table to check your hookah setup thingy (whatever you call that stuff, lol). Everything was great and I wouldnt complain about anything and this was my first experience! We had a great time and we will be back next time we are in Vegas! Not crowded, quiet enough so you dont have to scream at each other was the best part of this place!
First time here really enjoyed myself. There was a lot of chatter while the new comedians were up on stage. But I guess that party was celebrating and were turnt up.
Great hookah spot. Wonderful selection of flavors and hookah options! Lovely snacks to go with your hookah!
Been here a couple of times and I've always loved it. Good hookah menu, service and such a chill environment overall. Highly recommend.
Excellent customer service. Vegetarian friendly and amazing hookah flavors, hardcore.
Great service! Jacki was a fantastic server! The atmosphere was awesome! Nice music and a good crowd. It was right off of the strip near our hotel so very convenient location.

Uh,  no.  Servers are incompetent. Takes forever to get a drink.  Have to repeat your order several times. Took 15 minutes for the drinks to come and when they did,  we had to get our own napkins.  We ordered hookah 20 minutes ago and it still hasn't came.  This place is a joke.  Save your time and money.

I walked in here and couldn't even stay for 10 minutes. This place is BOUJEE...for no reason!  It's 10:45 pm on a Friday night and the place looks empty, but they said they only had bar and patio seating. Okay, fine. The host says "I think you can't smoke at the bar." We arrive at the bar where people are smoking hookah, but we are then told we can only smoke hookah at the end of the bar. Again, the rest of the bar is empty. So I guess we have to sit outside in 100 degree weather so that the empty couches appear to be  "exclusive"? Not to mention that the staff doesn't care to accommodate you.  Leave and find yourself another hookah spot that actually cares about their customers, there are plenty here in LV.  In fact, we decided to leave and find one just around the corner.

Today's experience was one for the books. Jay is a hottie w a body& the hookah & cheese fries were amazing! Our trip to Vegas wouldn't have been complete without stopping here. Customer service was A+!! I will be back soon!

On our walk back from the strip to the hotel we saw the Luna Lounge and decided to stop in for some beers to go. There was a man at the door who checked our id's and then let us inside. The place was busier than I assumed it would have been because it wasn't right on the strip. There was awesome lights flashing, loud music, and everyone I saw seemed to really be enjoying themselves. We ordered two beers and each was about $7 or $8. Ouch, but it is Vegas so we bought them. The bar tender was friendly and quick. I was also amazed should could hear what I said over the music. She must be a pro. We wanted to take our drinks to go back to the room and were stopped outside by security because they were in glass bottles. We had to go back inside to the bar to get two plastic cups. I am very glad the gentleman stopped us because I was not aware that I couldn't have glass walking down the street and I actually did end up spilling my $7 beer on the sidewalk. Overall it seemed like a good time for all to be had.

LIked the place. Their Salmon was amazing. Hookah - a bit expensive, but hey each business get's to chose their own price. Staff and waitresses were amazingly nice.
Been there twice already, and it is in my mind when I got to Vegas

We are from Reno and the service here was fantastic definitely a place to check out if you are in Vegas and like hookah. Ronnie Cece and Alan all had great costumer service and made our time enjoyable

This place is next to encore, next to the souvenir store and Indian restaurant. 

The place is pretty big with DJ booth, and a full size bar.

They also serve food here

Me and two of my friends went here when we were in Vegas as our number one place for hookah was closed that day.

They are the official supplier for Haze flavors. Haze flavors are hard to pack as they are extremely thick and you have to over packed a little to pack it right.

We had two hookahs, one with Haze flavors and one with Fumari flavors

The one with Fumari was ok as this was over packed and burned in few mins.

The one with Haze was pretty good. We could smoke it for a while without getting it harsh

The cool thing about this place is that they serve big hookah with a steel cage over the top for a perfect heat management.

Overall a great experience but it could have been better if the Fumari flavor was good too.

Came here with a group of people and to be honest the reviews almost scared me off.
1am we were craving some hookah so we decided to give this place a try as it was close to our hotel.
We get there and was greeted by Renee who was nothing but sweet! Tommy was at he door and greeted us. I forgot our server but she was the manager and made sure we were served and comfortable all night. 
The DJ was on point with Arabic, hip hop and EBM- this place was incredible. 
I cannot wait to come back and bringing all my friends here.
Great food, friendly staff, amazing hookah, hip atmosphere. What more could you want in a late night hookah tapas lounge. Must visit for Vegas!

The very wonderful hookah lounge I've ever been in, today I went there twice, I liked the hookah, the service, the courtesy, the food was really taste great, first time today I got the fastest hookah, it took only 4 minutes, I will be here every time I have visit to Las Vegas

Pretty cool spot....pretty pricey for the bowls compared to the standard locations but what do you expect, it's on the strip...has the standard + fruit bowls + ice tips.....alcohol is served here too...the closest thing to a nightclub a hookah lounge can get that i've seen..flavors can be better...bowls can be packed better but all in all one of the better hookah lounges in Las Vegas...

Guess celebrities who are irrelevant and forgotten are more important than a paying customer with an actual reservation. Also thanks for taking my card and not reminding me to use the card on file for my order. Guess you guys don't check voicemails either. Decent lounge just get it together with customer service and handling it better when it gets busy... but it's Vegas, what else should I expect besides a long wait time...

This place was dead around 1AM on Friday morning. About 7 other people were inside when we arrived. We walk in and the bouncer immediately runs over to us from across the room at the other entrance. What I IMMEDIATELY noticed was that the floor by the bar was completely wet. Unless it's a pool party or a bathtub, water, where it SHOULD NOT BE is a turn off!!! They did have a wet floor sign up. 

Idk the best word to describe the atmosphere so I'll just go with grunge meets night of the living dead. Our waitress was nice though. I ordered a long island iced tea and it was a strong as the airplane that we flew to Vegas on. We got two different flavors of hookas and it was my first time trying it....it was interesting. Not bad though, just interesting. They were $24 total which friendgirl said was a good price. The DJ was decent. This is a really low key spot, so don't go here if you want more of a crowd. I have a video that I'll try to post later on.

Excellent place.. two of my friends and i went on a Sunday night.. Great Vibe n everyone was dancing.. .. Dj was playing some sort of arabic music (probably he knew we were from Arab!!) really enjoyed the place.. Lounge suppose to close at 3 on Sunday's but they left it open for one more hour.. We made everyone happy and ended up tipping three time than our actual bill which was somewhere close to thousand..

I had made reservation for 8 people at 11:00pm but I had to call and change time to 12:00am and we arrived at 12:40am and a guest of 11 people but they were willing to work with us and we got seated immediately. The security takes there job serious. And at first one of my brothers wasn't going to be able to go inside because he did have a little attitude but not with security it was with his wife but after he calmed down the security let him in. Which I totally understand. We got seated and our waiter immediately start taking our orders. Beautiful waiter and she always checked on us to make sure everything was ok. I felt bad because one of my guest was spilling his drink and the guy had to come and clean like 3 times but he was always nice about it and never gave us a attitude. We did bottle service henny and it comes with hookah and plate of fries and order extra hookah and 4 buckets of beers. 1 blue moon, 2 Heineken and Corona. Let me just say the DJ was on point. He played all the jams and he did a little variety as well. It was cracking and the music was awesome and my whole group all agreed. Most of them was on the dance floor all night. And we were there from 12:40am to 4:00am. Our waiter brought a cake over for my sister because we were there celebrating her 30th birthday. Very nice and lounge and has like club environment too. We were going to go clubbing but I had injured my foot so I couldn't really walk so luckily I found this place on Yelp and my sister whom birthday it was loved it and said she had so much fun! She enjoyed her birthday and we all did and the dj gave her a shout out and she got a cheesecake I think it was too. Good place. Bathroom was clean everything was good and easy to get in and out. I feel bad that I didn't get my waiter name because she definitely was amazing and very sweet. Thank you Luna for making this a night to remember.

Loved this place, thanks for treating us right :)

I loved this place because they did the fruit bowl extremely well. If anyone else wants to try a fruit bowl that hasn't already, I'd recommend kiwi and mint on a pineapple base, and this place packs it great. The vibe here was comforting and really laid back. 

I would say that it's a bit tight on the leg room, but I'm also 6'6" so Not the typical size of the customer. Other than that, had a wonderful time here and am looking forward to visiting again next time.

The only reason this place is getting 3 stars and not 1 star is because of Alan & Jackie.

That first night we were in Las Vegas we decided to go to a hookah lounge close to the strip that we've been to before. 

We walked most of the strip from MGM down to Harrah's in 100-110 degree heat at night it was like around 9-10pm then we cabbed it the rest of the way. We got to Luna Lounge and we barely got out of the cab and the front host outside was standing with a security/bouncer and told us we had to spend $200.00 in order to sit inside with A/C on or not spend $200.00 and sit outside and smoke our hookah in the 110 degree weather. 

There is 5 of us going in (my sister, her husband, my boyfriend, and myself, and our homeboy) and we come here every time we are in Vegas no one has ever made that rule before that's a bit insensitive to make your customers sit outside in this heat no fans no mist etc and force them to pay $200.00 to get some A/C or be indoor.  We asked when did this rule happen they said "when we came out with these new menus." That was BS because nothing on there was new that we hadn't seen before & my sister and her husband had gone there a couple weeks before with some friends.

SO, we sat outside! When I asked for 5 bottles of water I checked the prices after the girl went to go grab our drinks I realized they were $5.00 per bottle. Hookah in Las Vegas is expensive (everything in Las Vegas is expensive on the strip for those who don't know) we didn't mind paying that's why we went there. Hookah was $24.00 each we ordered 3. Adding all this up with the waters we would already be spending over $100.00 with tax. 

I did the math to everyone and said lets just sit inside. We ended up sitting inside and knew we had to spend $200.00 apparently. When our hookahs came out 2/3 were made incorrectly. We waited 25 minutes for 1 hookah to be fixed and then 45 minutes for the other to be fixed. 

At this point we are all hella irritated and upset at this point, not only do we HAVE to spend $200.00 here but your customer service is horrible and your urgency to fix your mistake was not there. We asked to speak to a manager since the second hookah was fixed in 45 minutes later around 11:50 pm. Jackie didn't come to our table till 2:00 am. 

Alan was the ONLY employee besides Jackie (after we finally got to talk to her) that made us feel like our business was important and that they would try to do what it took to make it better for us. Alan tried his best to rush our new bowls over but it wasn't in his hands he just kept checking for us without us having to ask. Super friendly it was his 3rd day on the job and he was just a great person all around. We appreciated Alan because he listened and he made us feel like even though the mistake that happened wasn't his fault he would still check to see it was corrected and very apologetic. The management and other staff members could learn a thing or two from Alan. We wish we could take Alan back to the Bay with us because our hookah lounges out here would love having a worker like him he's truly a great worker.

Now onto Jackie.

Jackie has helped us out numerous of times before (like I said this isn't our first trip to Vegas or smoking hookah). I asked her is everyone in here spending $200.00? Because that is what your employee at the front door is telling your customers. Jackie was not surprised. She said we were one of several tables complaining about this issue. She said she has since talked to the employee and will be having a employee meeting once the place is closed for the night. 

We informed her although you may be some what busy the sense of urgency is not there from your staff besides Alan to get the mistake corrected. We don't want to spend money and time somewhere that we are clearly not wanted or cared for as customers/ consumers. 

The money isn't the issue because they can even tell you we spent over $200.00 and we would have spent more than we did had we had our hookahs were fixed in a timely manner rather than 25-45 minutes per each one. We were going to spend regardless because it was my brother in laws birthday. That's why we came out to Las Vegas. Everywhere we went we spent a good amount because we were out there celebrating. By the time it hit 2 am I didn't want to stay up any longer. I was tired of being there for 4 hours and it took 1 hour to get my hookah so I was personally over it. 

Jackie let us know a lot of the employees are fairly new and she was very apologetic. She gave us all free refills on our hookahs and helped us out the entire night for whatever we needed. 

The refills for whatever reason tasted better than the originals we ordered (they were the same flavor lol) and they came out so much faster. If it wasn't for me being so dam sleepy since we waited so long to get the mistake corrected I think I would have had a better night including everyone else because Alan and Jackie did change the experience for us in a better way
This is a great place. We had so much fun I highly recommend this place with a big group of friends and you guys will have a blast!
Came here to with a party of 6 around 1am on a Saturday night. Service and hooka was great. Food was okay. Most of all, the music was on point!!!! A chill way to end the night.

Came on a Sunday night. Packed, good vibe, but horrible service. Only 2 waitresses for the whole place made everything super slow. The sheesha wasn't flavorful and got ashy quickly. No one came to change bulbs and we got attitude when asking for water at the end of the night.
Great hookah good music. Huge crowd and still payed attention to us. Hard to find good lounges in Las Vegas.

If you're looking for something chill with great music in Las Vegas, this is the place to be! My friends and I were looking for something after having a late dinner and it was the perfect spot! They also have hookahs for those that choose to indulge :)

Perfect upscale atmosphere, even on a Wednesday night. Highly recommend! 
Hookah and drinks were superb!

I was on a roadtrip in the USA and everywhere I went I smoked hookah.
I don't write reviews about the staff or the music or any other crap. For me it's important to have a good hookah.
the hookah here is great! The coals keep coming and coming and the taste doesn't go away.
i smoked hookah in LA, SF, Phoenix, San Diego, Vegas and Salt Lake City. Red Velvet in San Diego was the best and Luna Lounge comes on the second place for me. I will definately keep coming back here for the rest of my stay in Vegas

I came here on a Friday night randomly because I was in Vegas to see a show over the weekend but had nothing going on the first night and didn't want to just stay in the hotel room. I found this place through yelp and had a blast! The music is cool, ranges from dance music to hip hop to Persian music. Very enjoyable but a little too loud. You have to shout to talk to people right next to you which was my only complaint. There is a dance floor as well as plenty of comfortable seating so you can join the dancing crowd or just chill. 

The food was a highlight as well. Had the hummus trio, white pizza and feta stuffed mushrooms which were all very tasty. The price was reasonable too. We had dinner, drinks for two, and two hookah flavors for under $80. I don't smoke hookah frequently but I'll absolutely be back if I'm ever in Vegas and in the mood for it in the future.

Their hookahs are very good; drinks and foods are excellent! 

Service is fairly fast and they have different night types (belly dancing, Latin nights, 80's etc) 

Most importantly, the place is classy and clean.

I like this lounge. Very cool inside. Staff is very nice. The crew here all are always working making sure things and clean and neat and service is great for all guest. I went on a more mellow night and I loved the music and the hookah too. I could see myself coming back here again.
Came here with a couple friends on a Thursday night. There is a DJ playing good music and they offer food and drinks also. Will come again soon!

If you're ever looking for something to do and are tired from the strip craziness, this place has really good hookah. It was? really smooth.  We let them choose the flavors and both came out well. Great and friendly staff too. Nice vibe and good music too.  Ask for Norma!

Staff are nice and friendly
Hookah is average 
Service is soooo slow
Definitely wont go back again

By far the most expensive hookah I ever paid for. I had a Groupon to this place, but since I came late the person working the line outside would not honor it or even consider lowering the price/discounting the hookah. So that Groupon was a waste. (-1/2 star)
Although their hookah was descent, produced good smoke, flavor great, it wasn't the best. I've been to multiple hookah spots, so I would know. I got the Code 69 and two water bottles that ended up being $36. I'm from San Francisco and they don't even charge that much for hookah. (-1/2 star)
Also, their customer service needs improvement. Ever heard of a smile and giving eye contact when speaking to a customer? (-1 star) because customer service is everything to me.

Horrible people and rude. Bought the Groupon and came in. Party of 4 and we were all 21 except 1 person was 18. The stupid server said that they recently changed the rule from 21 to 18 but failed to update their website so we took a taxi which cost a lot in Las Vegas to come here and they told us that even though their website and Groupon state it's 18 and up. The manager or the owner refused to come to talk to us and had the stupid servers come talk to us. Obviously he or she had no guts to come talk to us. Never coming back to this place with their shitty service and horrible customer service.

Latin Music Wednesdays Review

If you are looking for a place to go dancing dont go here. This is primarily a hookah lounge/bar. Left at almost midnight and no one even has the intention of dancing. I don't smoke so this was a bad choice for me. 
We ordered a couple of drinks and an appetizer. After the first round we asked for a cup of water before getting started on the second round. The server insisted we had to get bottles of water ($).... I don't believe In paying for something that should be legally free and especially if we are going to contribute to purchase additional drinks. 
Well that was the end of that and we closed our checks and left. In my opinion this is bad business.  For a better option try La Jolla.
Great service. Amazing atmosphere and music. Just didn't like the fact that they wouldn't honor my Groupon

great hookah..! we ordered the frozen lakes..it lasted about 2 hours.. hookahs are only $24 i went on a saturday night & was seated immediately.. the service is extremely slow.. took a long time for us to get our orders taken.. they have great food.. shrimp scewers were bomb.. drinks were $9-$12.. reasonably priced hookah lounge.. music was on point.! hip hop and reggaeton.. waiters are very nice once you get their attention.. security was helpful.. customer service is definitely priority here.! don't forget to use the yelp discount after making a review.
Don't spend the money to get there! Service was non-existent.  Sat a table for 20 minutes and watched waitresses walk by and never give as much as a glance. Wasted our time and spoiled our night.

Sunday night the music sucks !! Not edm. But house mix. Requested a bit of hip hop and Dj told us this is what he's playing tonight. The crowd isn't moving to the music at all. Also very dead on Sundays. The nachos were good. Drinks and food are good price for Vegas. Also not a good air filtration for hookah spot.

Krystel and Emmanuel are the best. They will definitely take care of you when you come. Krystel made sure we were fine and would check up on us very often. She was fast and very nice. Emmanuel definitely took care of our hookah. Changed our coals pretty often to keep the bowl going. 

Music and atmosphere is great. Definitely will come here every time I come to Vegas. 

Drinks were tastee. We got a whiskey sour and their specialty Mango drink.

Hookah was good. We had an apple bowl with double apple and mint. The second night we got an apple bowl again with spiced chai and mint. Get a fruit bowl of you come. It adds more flavor and last longer. We were here smoking the same bowl for at least 2-3 hours. 

Definitely should come here after 11:30. That's when the atmosphere is the best.
